name: Choice of Rebels: Stormwright
description: The uprising continues! You fled the armies of the Hegemony into a nightmare wilderness. Now escape the storms of chaos magic to spread the flames of your rebellion in this epic fantasy RPG.

name: Wyrmhole: The Forbidden Knowledge
description: A daemon spawned by a lab accident steals the Sacred Texts of Fauna Akademia and vanishes into the tunnels beneath. As the Head Librarian May, and with a team of laboratory researchers, conquer the tunnels and demand on time book returns.

name: Find with Seoul: Story Puzzle
description: Follow the story of clones set in post-cyberpunk dystopian Seoul while solving 3-match puzzles. Experience the change in the low-grade clone Charashi who couldn't even afford a piece of bread.

name: Chrono Crystal: Giant Gate DLC
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Toy Shire
description: Are you prepared for a thrilling toy army tower defense adventure? Welcome The Toy Shire! Battle diverse foes in various locations, defend your family, and repel foes from your area. Save the world by strengthening your defense with toy towers!

name: Time Handlers
description: Time Handlers is a cooperative puzzle game where you play as 2 employees of the Time Company tasked to repair the spatio-temporal rifts caused by a mysterious tower. Face baffling and exciting challenges to progress through the various levels of the rift that threatens time.

name: War Of Celestials
description: Join the fight for world domination as the Celestials fight over territory. Play your way with multiple different classes and sub classes. Want to assassinate people or perhaps you want to cast fire ball no matter the room size, either way there is a play style for everyone.

name: Pongspin
description: A surreal, experimental take on Pong challenging you to protect a circular "core" using an orbiting paddle to deflect the ball.

name: Love Is All Around
description: The player becomes Gu Yi, uses the first-person perspective to immerse himself in meeting six beauties, and embarks on a joyful and sweet love journey with them. Six girls that are charming, innocent, intelligent, wild, sexy, glamorous, who will go to the end with you is up to you to decide.

name: DoughNuts
description: DoughNuts is an exhilarating top-down roguelite shooter that revolves around a map composed of randomly arranged cells. Navigate through the map, carefully choosing which cell to uncover next. Each step may lead to intense battles with doughy invaders, valuable bonuses, or crazy bosses.

name: Synergia: Sunrise
description: One year after the events of the Synergia Incident, Cila and Mara's lives have drastically changed, as have the lives of all those around them. This DLC is a small glimpse into their future outside of The Empire, and the repercussions of their actions during the main game.

name: Kill The Crows
description: "Kill The Crows" is a fast-paced top-down arena shooter set in the twisted western era. A gunslinger burning with vengeance steps into the ruins of a forsaken town, ready to face death. Prepare for one-shot, one-kill gunfights using classic revolvers and fanning techniques.

name: The Lost Hotel
description: Welcome to The Lost Hotel, a pixel art adventure/mystery game where you take on the role of a hotelier, saving the hotel from an endless time loop. Explore the hotel and interact with a diverse cast of characters. Uncover secrets and solve puzzles to unravel the mystery of the hotel's past.

name: Gloomscape
description: Step into the eerie and mysterious world of Gloomscape! With your trusty mood ring and sense of adventure, you’ll craft, explore, and strategize your way through this bizarre world. But beware - ghastly creatures lurk around every corner.

name: Small Nights
description: Explore the thrilling places, that you end up as you sleep... What could this be all for? What mysteries await?

name: Drugz: 2D Drug Empire Simulator
description: Become a true Drug Lord in Drugz, an idle strategy game. Buy cheap, sell high, invest money in facilities and dodge police operations and rival gangs to expand your empire. Become the greatest Drug Lord in history and become a legend.

name: Living Cell
description: You are the only liquidator in block G-326 of the endless Gigakhrushchevka who survived. Now you have to find out what happened in this block, evacuate the residents and find a way out for yourself. But is everything as obvious as it seems at first glance?

name: GimmickHeart
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Lobster Simulator
description: Beautiful simple and cute game where you raise a Cat Lobster. Feed, play, wash and rest your cat lobster in real time. Earn gold coins in minigames, and customise the lobster's tank! If you raise your cat lobster well, it will moult its shell and evolve into an adult cat lobster.

name: Backrooms Rec.
description: Dive into the haunting Backrooms, where reality blurs and nightmares lurk. Survive, explore, and uncover dark secrets. Solo-developed, immersive, and coming soon to Steam Early Access. Shape the future. Adventure awaits!

name: Project Hoyrá
description: Project Hoyrá is a Narrative Action-Adventure game in third-person view taking place in a brand new post-apocalyptic fantasy world. In the demo you will play as Elduin, controlling the water element, to try and find a lost civilization supposed to be the last remaining elemental nation.

name: GanaBlade
description: This is a hot barrage shooting game. Destroy enemy planes with powerful firepower, shuttle and evade in the barrage. Various scenes with rich colors Planets, Fire Stars, Jupiter Stars, Water Stars, and huge battleships. It's time to drive a space fighter and show your strength! !

name: Ocean Explorer
description: Journey through the decaying world of 2048. A time for exploration and discovery. The quest begins to reclaim the lost world maps.

name: Mimic Logic
description: "Mimic Logic" is an automatically generated logic puzzle roguelike. Listen to the statements of the treasure chests, find the lying mimics, and open the rest of the treasure chests! Opening a mimic results in a game over.

name: Within The Depths
description: Explore a mysterious island flooded with dangerous creatures in both Singleplayer and Multiplayer gamemodes!

name: The Chronicles of Eleos: The Hall of Azaron
description: The Chronicles of Eleos: The Hall of Azaron is a classic RPG where we control an archaeologist wizard on a journey through the continent of Eleos, a place with various peoples and cultures and full of mysteries and craziness just waiting for a nosy enough wizard to reveal them.

name: Classified: France '44
description: Command an elite team of allied special operators in Nazi-occupied France wreaking havoc in the run up to D-Day in this ambitious turn-based tactics game. Take on the might of Germany's war machine and launch daring raids in occupied territory. Can you do enough to ensure Allied victory?

name: Food Magician
description: Food Magician is an fantasy action-adventure/RPG game that filled with hidden treasures, dangerous creatures, and ancient ruins. With stunning graphics and beautiful music, Food Magician features various gameplay mechanics, including real-time combat, traps, and puzzle-solving.

name: Happiness Market
description: A simple simulation and management game. Build different shops and earn money from passing customers.

name: Le Mans Ultimate
description: Le Mans is a continually evolving story... powered by emotion, speed and glory. Le Mans Ultimate – the official game of the FIA World Endurance Championship & 24 Hours of Le Mans.

name: Cannon Target
description: Cannon Target - A simple puzzle game, the only goal of the player is to choose the firing direction of the cannon and hit the target.

name: Blackout Memphis
description: Blackout Memphis is a fast topdown shooter, characterized by bloody melees and action-packed gunfights. The demanding gameplay is backed by electronic music that adds a special atmosphere to the gritty and violent action.

name: Platboarder
description: A combination of a board game and platformer. Roll the dice and play your cards to complete all the levels. Don't forget to pet the animals along the way!

name: Tower of Pandemonium
description: Tower of Pandemonium is a top-down RPG and 2D platformer full of action, puzzles, mystery and memorable characters where your choices determine your fate.

name: Mystery Trackers: Fatal Lesson Collector's Edition
description: It's no ordinary town... Can you stop a mad mayor and his destructive robots?

name: Riversiders
description: Raft down the river, camp in the wild, and make friends!

name: Backrooms Abyss
description: Explore and survive levels based on the popular creepypasta lore. Each level offers various escape routes but also introduces perilous obstacles. Players can immerse themselves in the seemingly boundless and unsettling levels of the backrooms, experiencing the game's eerie and intricate mazes.

name: Epic Knight 2
description: Epic Knight 2 - Bad Dudes are attacking the Kingdom (Again). It is up to You to put Your RPG Skills to the test and stop them !

name: Bubblegum Bandit
description: With the power of gravity manipulation and bubblegum, the Bubblegum Bandit wreaks havoc and takes revenge! Steal from evil robots and blow up their ships!

name: Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners Prologue
description: Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners Prologue is a first part of the Survival & Horror: Mortanis Prisoners.

name: The Dark Climb
description: The Dark Climb is a challenging, third person, resource-based, stealth game in which you try to reach the end of a dark and dangerous map. You are equipped with a light source, which is directly bound to your life in the game.

name: 3D Puzzle: Desert Wind
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: 3D Puzzle: Medieval Inn
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: 3D Puzzle: Farming
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Creepless
description: This is a multiplayer co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Collect items, repair car and get out! But monsters will bother you.

name: Times Of War
description: "Times Of War" - A sci-fi tower defense strategy game with armored vehicles, tanks, choppers, planes, explosive action, and three unique environments. Upgrade towers, earn Tech points, manage resources, and defend your base in epic battles. Get ready for intense warfare!

name: SkyDribble
description: Dribble the object to reach the goal! In the bottomless sky! A simple mouse-only 3D platformer game that anyone can enjoy.

name: Hufu Riding and Shooting
description: 胡服騎射 Hufu riding and shooting is a third-person control RPG Game.From far east mainland, Their are 7 lord in "Zhou" period.This is about 2,200 years ago. you lead your army to ride horses and shoot arrows to expand your land.

name: Wordsock Classic
description: Compete in local or online word battles. Supports solo mode with or without AI players.

name: Train Simulator: Western Maryland H-9 Class
description: Return to the glorious age of steam railroading in the Allegheny Mountains with Machine Rail's extraordinary Western Maryland H-9 class 2-8-0 built by The Baldwin Locomotive Works!

name: SS.Archives
description: This is a text adventure game with elements of horror, suspense, and puzzle-solving. Players take on the role of a detective, encountering various mysterious cases. These cases may be bizarre, eerie, or seemingly calm on the surface, but with turbulent undercurrents beneath.

name: Star Conflict: Edges of Risk - Stage one: Deluxe edition
description: This pack includesAccess to additional rewards in the event “Edges of risk. Stage one”.Upon receipt, the following 15 levels are immediately unlocked and all rewards of the unlocked levels are available30 days of premium license.

name: OMSI 2: Add-On Coachbus 303-Series
description: The Coachbus 303-Series add-on for OMSI 2 is a high-quality expansion that provides a realistic simulation of the iconic O303-Series bus from various countries.

name: Xargon Remake Ep.3
description: A remake of the classic 1993 DOS video game Xargon.

name: Four Lights
description: "Four Light" by Visual Novel, urban fantasy RomanceA world where humans use superpowers all over the world.The stage is a story that takes place in the fictional city of Gaon City in modern times (about 2020).

name: Knight Overloaded
description: Night Overloaded is a roguelight survival game that reinforced strategic choices. Beat enemies falling from the sky endlessly, and expand your inventory!

name: Fox Adventure: Homeward Journey
description: A challenging 2D platform game.

name: Hell Trigger
description: You are Unit ***, a soldier who was tasked to do a yearly expedition to The Flesh. Your Mission: Find and gather data about The Heart of The Flesh, and why it is eating up all of humanity. Can you reach The Heart in this brutal horror inspired rouge like?

name: Charon: Zhetan Chronicles
description: Overcome the chasm ordained by divine fate! Charon - Zhetan Chronicles is a 2D Fantasy RPG with pixel art visuals. An epic story with queer characters, strategic battles and handmade artworks awaits you!

name: Ecumene Aztec
description: The Great Tenochtitlan is on fire. Now that the war has broken out, I must choose whether to join our compatriots to repel the invader, or to join the newcomers who want to liberate us from the priests sacrificing our own brothers and children.

name: RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone
description: In RIP: Ridiculously Injury Prone - Embark on a slapstick-filled adventure where mishaps are the norm. Keep your wits about you, dodge calamity, and quickly complete tasks without getting injured!

name: Vroom Vroom Valley
description: Hit the race track and improve your racing skills or take a sunday drive in a beautiful scenery. Vroom Vroom Valley offers a safe driving experience for the rookies but can also challenge the most seasoned veterans.

name: Turn on the Light: Jigsaw
description: A minimalist game about connecting circuits, solving jigsaw puzzles and mind-bending recursive circuits.

name: Mines Of Moritania
description: Experimental, None Linear, Cosmic Horror Game.

name: Grim-World: Survival
description: Grim World is a survival and adventure game in which you can build your home, create your character and shape it to your liking . You can become a warrior, a hunter or even a magician. You may well be halfway between a hunter and a magic like you want

name: 49 Squares
description: Simplistic, relaxing puzzle game. Click boxes to create patterns. Make patterns to complete 100 achievements.

name: Mutrix
description: Mutrix is a music movement VR game, in which players need to use a lightsaber to slash flying notes, the greater the movement, the higher the score. The game library is rich, covering a variety of styles of music. Let's rhythm together!

name: Train Simulator: China Railways CR400BF
description: Board the China Railways CR400BF ‘Golden Phoenix’ from Just Trains for an exhilarating run along South West China High Speed.

name: Artificial Fright
description: Artificial Fright is a tense horror survival game where you play as an assistant robot in an old, abandoned warehouse. Explore your surroundings, conserve your battery power, and manage your systems using a Unix-like terminal.

name: Weather Dominance
description: 2D action platformer game where you don't play as the player but you play as the weather and you help the players to platform and save the environment from the eco-disasters

name: The Submerging Island
description: Conquer an industrial wasteland to save your sinking home. Battle adversaries, make choices, and become the hero against global warming. A first ever third-person RPG on Global Warming.

name: Dignacia
description: You are missioned to stimulate one of the planets in Dignacia Universe, Feed your animals and plant your seeds with using advanced technology. Upgrade your tools, explore the mysteries of the planet, dive into water, manage the city that you build and destroy bad creatures for bringing peace!

name: Hanctt Origins
description: Hanctt is a continent covered with fog, and surviving in the black fog, which is called black fog, is next to impossible.

name: Old School RPG
description: Old School RPG is a first-person fantasy turn-based role playing game. Create a party of adventurers and clear out dungeons and solve puzzles. Find and eliminate the source of evil that has come to your lands.

name: Soulkeeper Diaries
description: Soulkeeper Diaries is a story-based action adventure game that takes place in different worlds. Help Dogu to find his homeland while exploring worlds and islands with his balloon.

name: Russian Village Simulator
description: This is a simulator of life in the Russian countryside, where the player will be engaged in the garden, picking mushrooms and berries, collect firewood, hunting and fishing, brew moonshine and much, much more.

name: WarSphere
description: WarSphere is a fast-paced, Roguelike Top-Down Shooter. As an Armed Spherical Robotic System, you blast, loot and boost your way through procedurally generated worlds and dungeons in order to fulfill your purpose and become part of 'the Archive', which only marks the end of the beginning. Endgame activities include Daily Speed Running Leaderboards, Community Maps, etc.

name: Comet Clash
description: Take control of humanity’s last resort in defending the planet from the many dangers outer space has to offer. Shoot or deflect incoming projectiles, harvest them from the moon and spend the loot on upgrades.

name: Ziggy
description: Ziggy is a challenging platformer about a small lightning bolt trying to get back home. Your main objective is to go through all the traps and reach the end. Can you do it?

name: ZombieWave FM
description: ZombieWave FM is an immersive 1980s zombie-survival shooter. Fight through waves, restore power, unlock areas, and save Gloomtown. Single-player, co-op, and multiplayer modes. Customization, diverse weapons, retro visuals, and a haunting soundtrack. Survive the undead and reclaim the town!

name: Matinta
description: Embark on an epic journey in "Matinta," a Brazilian adventure game. Guide Gracinda to restore natural landscapes and free forest entities. Explore enchanting scenarios, immerse in nature's wonders. With stunning art and soundtrack, Matinta delivers fun, and deep connection with nature.

name: Island Notes
description: The yacht is in distress, you and a stranger (optional character) are stranded on a desert island, and you must use everything around you to stay with her until rescue arrives. The game includes a variety of gameplay, such as building, planting, love cultivation, hunting, catching, cooking, etc.

name: Agent Team Simulator: Your Agent in the Game
description: Unleash your imagination and create your very own Agent to feature across all versions of the game!

name: Doors & Loot
description: Make your way to the top of the tower and stop the sorcerer who controls it to free the unwary people who got there and are now cursed. Trade, craft, upgrade your skills and loot as you discover its history, as the higher you go the better the reward.

name: Dinogen Online: Commando Bundle
description: Commando Bundle with 15 Shards, 3 Weapons, and 6 Character Items!

name: The Directorate: The Spy Who Killed A Saint
description: Play as a spy vying to stop unthinkable destruction. Sneak, fight and trick your way through countless grunts, guards and bosses. The 60s themed comical experience will challenge you to foil the destructive plans of a malevolent overlord within pre-set in game hours.

name: Dice Mayor
description: Welcome to Dice city, new mayor. Govern your city with only dice. Dice Mayor combines dice rolling with city building in a roguelike setting.

name: 7th Domain
description: "7th Domain" is a horizontal version action game derived from Roguelike Metroidvania combined with treasure grinding gameplay. You will play a child of destiny who repairs the world and finds the truth of the broken world. You will grow in battle and challenge the unknown and hidden forces.

name: The Necromancer Cometh!
description: The Necromancer Cometh is a tower defense game with a focus on mazing, fun characters, and interesting abilities. Build towers with special abilities, upgrade them to more powerful levels, create your maze through interesting maps, and survive wave after wave of enemies with unique powers!

name: Little Odyssey
description: Relax while traveling around fantasy desert on your giant turtle-giraffe. Deliver packages and explore the world in your Little Odyssey!

name: Dreamcore
description: Step into the surreal with Dreamcore, a body-cam styled psychological horror game that plunges you into the eerie beauty of "liminal spaces." Unravel the mysteries of Dreamcore’s non-linear worlds and uncover its hidden secrets. Can you discover what lies beyond the edge of reality?

name: The Multiverse Cleaner
description: You are Ted, a multiverse cleaner. Travel across multiple universes and realities to complete your employer's tasks. Each mission takes place in a different universe, but there is a central plot that connects them all. It's up to you to protect the multiverse.

name: Touhou Hareiden
description: Touhou Project Doujin JRPG game. The youseis are wreaking havoc in Gensokyo, intensifying the frustrations of summer. Embark on a quest with Hakurei Reimu and Kirisame Marisa as they aim to resolve this incident while Marisa seeks to reclaim her lost powers.

name: A Silly Goofy Dream 2
description: This game is funny, it is not meant to be taken seriously. ASGD2 is a funny exploration style game in which you go around finding funny NPC's and interacting with them, trying to find them all in a vast world.

name: MazeMaze
description: "MAZEMAZE" is an adventure game where you explore maps, find objects, and progress through the story. One day, the protagonist jumps off a building and finds themselves in a mysterious space. They are guided through corridors in a maze where various things exist.

name: The Event
description: The Event is a first-person psychological horror game that offers immersive gameplay and a rich narrative. Find yourself stuck in mystery and struggle in the dark against paranormal activities, demons from other worlds and much more. Will you be able to find out the truth and return home?

name: LongStory 2
description: Award-winning LongStory gets a sequel! The Weasel Heights gang continues to surprise and delight as you learn more about yourself, friendship and love. Play as the gender of your choice and date the friend you like best. Throw a big mystery in the mix and you’re in for an adventure!

name: Wild City
description: Shape your urban ecosystem in Wild City, a unique roguelike deckbuilder! Rule a harmonious society or indulge in the citizens' primal instincts, as you shape your own concrete jungle!

name: Defenders of Legends
description: Defend your kingdom against legendary monsters. Place turrets strategically to block their path. Upgrade your defenses to fend off enemy hordes. Become the legendary guardian of the earth alone or in co-op!

name: Zamakan
description: Experience an alternative reality where ancient Egyptians have become a space travel civilization. Fly an Egyptian-themed space ship through an asteroid field, avoiding collisions with objects that bend the fabric of time-space. How far can you go in this endless runner game?

name: Another Chance
description: Another Chance is an isometric, story driven experience which pits you in the midst of an alien apocalypse. Split apart by your wife, your only objective is reuniting with her...or is it?

name: Fist of Yokai
description: Prepare to throw down in a world where steam meets the supernatural, as you hack and slash your way through a procedurally generated maze filled with yokai horrors. Upgrade yourself and slash through yokai leaders to save the steampunk metropolis in this exciting rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Xochi's Apothecary
description: A deceptively cozy narrative game about an alchemist that immigrates to a new country and opens an apothecary. Get to know your weird and wonderful community, brew the potions your customers need, and use your words to stir up a country on the brink of change.

name: Little Mall Tycoon
description: Let's make your dream mall! Hire great employees and train them. Sell everything that customers want. Upgrade your mall and prepare to deal with unexpected events. Be the best mall in the world.

name: Wyrd Gun
description: A roguelite looter shooter about breeding guns and leveling up to survive hoards of creatures on a strange planet!

name: Hearthkeeper
description: Hearthkeeper is a fantasy colony simulator, with rpg and platformer elements. Your characters will require food, water and shelter as the seasons change and the world turns. Plant crops, build structures, defend against raiders and beasts, research technologies and much more.

name: Rise and Grind!
description: We call you to survive in a world that only wakes you up once a year. Wake up, collect, build, expand, be prepared for dangers, and sleep for one year! Each awakening brings a new adventure, an opportunity to become stronger!

name: Marine Glory
description: Marine Glory is a single player sailing looting adventure. Find treasures, buy and upgrade new ships and explore multiple universes.

name: Dreaming Diorama
description: A unique casual puzzle game where you create a variety of dioramas. Explore and assemble dioramas in a 3D environment. Enjoy relaxing gameplay that allows you to create dioramas at your own pace with no time restraints.

name: Mr. Mookie and the Runaway Cookie
description: Help Mr. Mookie retrieve his giant cookie in this adorable puzzle-platformer! Glide through the clouds, explore alien lands, and solve complex puzzles to get the cookie and dip it in milk.

name: Hainya World
description: You are an adventurer, you need to explore this continent, make good use of the resources of this continent to arm yourself, explore this world full of monsters and unknown things and survive!

name: Elkrone no Atelier: Dear for Otomate Limited Edition
description:
Otomate-developed visual novel for the PlayStation Portable based on the turn-based RPG Atelier series by Gust. The limited edition of Elkrone no Atelier: Dear for Otomate comes with an audio drama CD and an exclusive artbook.

Meriela (a.k.a Meri) has inherited her grandmother's workshop, and now it's up to her to decide what to do with it. One day, a fairy called Popotto pops up at the front door, asking her to create a mysterious item—the Blue Wakaka.

Neither the client nor the alchemist have ever seen it, but since the fairy is in no great hurry, he decides to lodge with Meri to help her out with item synthesis, ingredient collection, monster fights and finding her soul mate.

name: Falling Down
description: "Falling Down" tells the story of a young hero destined for heroics through a visually stunning action-platformer game.

name: Chrono Crystal: Factory DLC
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Live at Strummer's Pond
description: Come for a visit to Strummer's Pond with your friends! It's a cozy place full of tiny musical critters. Explore, ride a frog, pollinate flowers, and play some tunes along the way. ✨

name: Mortal Kombat: Defenders of The Realm
description: This is a Mortal Kombat fan game made with OpenBor.

name: Kaardik
description: Join the exciting world of Kaardik, a creature collection game. Embark on exciting adventures with your Kaardiks in the fascinating region of Kodumaa. Capture all the Kaardiks, battle with other trainers, and beat the king.

name: Vulpis
description: Guide a lonely fox through a vast interconnected world of a mysterious planet Vulpis in this Metroidvania-style game. Explore non-linear paths, unlock new abilities, fight enemies, overcome obstacles, and unravel the planet's mysteries to find a way back home.

name: Burger Zombies
description: A top down free roaming shooter where you play as a burger delivery man who is completing his orders during the zombie apocalypse. Pick up and deliver orders while shooting and driving against a ever growing horde of zombies.

name: Machi: Above the Void
description: Is a captivating voxel-style indie puzzle game set in Japan style. Immerse yourself in its mesmerizing atmosphere, solve puzzles, and enjoy relaxing Asian-inspired music. Compete in multiplayer, climb leaderboards, and unlock achievements. A captivating journey of tranquillity and challenge awaits.

name: Fix Fixer
description: Fix Fixer is Action RPG with Roguelike elements which you play through Hephaestus' procedurally generated universes as an one and only handyman of him, Fix Fixer!

name: AstroPuffs
description: Crash landed on an alien planet with your crew, build an awesome base and advance it through Exploration, Science, Crafting and Salvaging. Face Rival Factions, Deadly Bosses, Alien Wildlife and other Planetside Mysteries in this Valheim inspired Colony Sim.

name: Silent Shores
description: Silent Shores is a first-person open world horror game where you play as a father searching for his missing son on an abandoned island.

name: Fall into Decay
description: A girl named Celica woke up in a strange mansion one day. She seemed to have forgotten something important... But her first goal was to find a way to escape from here.

name: Gonshit infarct
description: You are correct, but "gOnshit infarct" is a brand new romance simulation visual novel developed by AGC GAMES. The game takes place in a fantasy world called "Tiamat," where chosen individuals are bestowed with the power of "Free to play" to guide the flow of memes.

name: Prospect
description: Prospect is a turn-based tactics game focusing on immersive, in-depth combat and takes place inside a dystopian penal colony on a distant, hostile planet. In combat, take advantage of the powerful "Trial & Execute" system to plan, modify, and carry out the actions of your choice.

name: Dragon's Doom: A Skyhopper Tale
description: Start as a hatchling dragon, you have one goal: To Survive. The best way to survive? Is to fight, burn and eat your way into growing to a full fledge dragon. Burn the villages to the ground!

name: The Realm of Insight Compass
description: The Realm of Insight Compass is a turn-based tactical chess game that features a rotating board and a unique terrain system, adding more challenge and strategic depth to the gameplay.Formations are like chessboards, and chessboards are like life.

name: Rise for the Fight
description: A Cartoon Multiplayer FPS Game, where you can upgrade your guns by dealing damage or gaining multikills.

name: Queen of Moths
description: It's a winter night. You are coming home by train. You have to change trains at a small train station in the middle of the forest.It's not the first time you've traveled this route. But now you feel like something is different.As if something was watching you.

name: Project Hunt
description: It is a semi-realistic hunting game. Animals are shot and killed with guns. The shot review shows animal detail and the bullet's hit.

name: Traders of Natac
description: Traders of Natac is a realtime resource management simulation. Settle in resource-rich areas, trade with dynamic prices, expand your empire across the board and claim victory over all of Natac!

name: Spell Hell
description: Spell Hell is a top-down arena roguelite where you play as a powerful wizard with advanced combo magics, to fight off hordes of monsters. Design your build with synergizing upgrades creating powerful combos, and defeat waves of enemies.

name: Blind Frontiers
description: Embark on an RPG-survival road trip adventure with Niuma, a unique and singular character on a quest to uncover The Eldorado. Navigate through a post-war world marked by limited resources. Explore cities, interact with locals, and manage resources while confronting your stigmas to survive.

name: Pipelinks
description: Welcome to Pipelinks, a 2D tile-based puzzle game where you'll use your problem-solving skills to connect a variety of pipe creatures and help them navigate challenging levels!

name: Riddle for your Life
description: Do you have what it takes to solve all riddles? Your life may depend on it. The stakes are high. Winning grants you a powerful reward, losing means certain death. Are you brave enough to play the odds?

name: Homicipher: Prologue
description: Homicipher is an adventure horror game where you’ll decipher a language, fall in love and escape. Players will face various horrifying men in this strange world. Your aim is to decipher their language and eventually find a way to escape. Meanwhile, a peculiar feeling also starts to bloom.

name: H.I.A: Horror Investigation Agency
description: H.I.A: Horror Investigation Agency is a fun multiplayer horror game in which you and co-players have to investigate unique horror cases. Among finding victims and evidence of the horror event that has taken place, you will be faced with jumpscares and scary monsters along your investigation.

name: Invaders from the Third Dimension
description: A retro space game with 3D graphics and modern controls. Rotate your ship and shoot at any angle, instead of just sliding back and forth. Enjoy 3D graphics with lighting effects and realistic explosions.

name: TD Royale
description: TD Royale is a real-time multiplayer tower defense where you summon enemies for your opponents. Balance economy and offense without letting your own defenses fail in order to outwit your enemy and be the last summoner standing!

name: Galactic Grinder
description: Rider, skateboarder extraordinaire, is about to embark on a journey across the solar system after a catastrophic event sets him on a course to save us all.

name: Doppelganger: Nightmare Realm
description: This is a dark story about a little boy trying to survive in a parallel world of his doppelganger. You will have to experience adventures in places of life and death of your doppelganger, solve all the puzzles, and make your way from the cemetery to birth.

name: Trash of the Titans
description: It's turn-based fantasy combat with trash animals. Defend your trash from invading vermin, and use your trash to upgrade your team. Think your way out of ruin by using the shape of each level to your advantage. Be creative, and try to not die.

name: SiideQuest
description: A medieval fantasy, open-world, souls-like indie RPG, told through side quests instead of a main storyline. Explore the land of Noh'relia by helping strangers, slaying monsters, discovering hidden treasures, and connecting the dots to move on from your troubled past.

name: Escape Simulator VR
description: Venture into captivating escape rooms solo or in an online co-op with up to 8 players (optimal 2-3). Pick up and examine everything, break objects, solve locks, and decipher puzzles to escape! After finishing the main game, watch for free content updates and explore 3000+ community-made rooms.

name: Parallel Pals
description: Parallel Pals is a 2D puzzle platformer where you control 2 players. The bottom Player is stuck in the level and can't reach the platforms to proceed. The top Player should find/craft resources and send them through the portal connecting two players.

name: Jack Holmes: Master of Puppets
description: Survival Horror in first person where you must manage your ammunition well, explore varied scenarios and face nightmarish beings, while investigating the macabre experiments with children, the result of a mind unhinged by madness and family loss.

name: Wholesome: Heartdrawn
description: Wholesome: Heartdrawn is a Turn-Based RPG and adventure game about Lyra, who creates her world to imagine her memories to escape from some things. Explore real and imagined worlds, and go on adventures. Lead Lyra and help her handle everything.

name: Daedalus: You Have Been Chosen
description: Go on a scary adventure, whether you decide to face the dangerous path alone or team up with your friends. This intense game guarantees a mysterious experience every time you play. Get ready to solve tricky puzzles, avoid a terrifying monster, and fight your way out of the intricate maze.

name: Card Detective
description: "Card Detective" is a unique single-player card game that combines card gameplay, deduction, collection, and educational elements. The game features an engaging storyline and innovative gameplay.

name: Cybergrid Runner
description: This is a stealth puzzle game set in a cyber city. Help the hacker infiltrate the system by manipulating the intricate 5x5 tile system. Collect powerful implant upgrades and weapons. Brace yourself for endlessly thrilling playthroughs, as each session unveils procedurally generated labyrinth.

name: Will You Wheel?
description: Transform your rusty vehicle into a powerful race car by skillfully installing various parts. Engage in a variety of money-making activities such as woodcutting, nocturnal racing, or pizza delivery. Perhaps you're interested in managing a workshop for yourself? The possibilities are endless!

name: Mars Survivors
description: Ready to tackle the challenge? On Mars, confront countless mutated creatures and mechanical monsters. Choose survivors, weapons, and skills wisely for diverse battles. Employ precise shooting, agile dodging, and strategic use of props and skills to fend off enemy attacks.

name: A Deep Rest
description: A Deep Rest is a collection of short stories about men and their relationship with mental health and depression. Taking control of a different character in each story, you will experience life from their perspective. See the problems and issues they face and help them find ways to be alright again.

name: Stars, Stripes, and Subgames
description: Immerse yourself in a world of captivating and diverse subgames, inspired by the essence of America.

name: Angel Legion: Lil Lily - Green
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Haunted Memories: The Return
description: Haunted Memories: The Return is a psychological horror in which you assume the role of yourself. You decide which path you will take and what will happen in Green Park this time. But the question remains - will you ever be able to leave?

name: Sayfield Defense
description: A Tower Defense game with an integrated FPS system! Sayfield Defense sets place in a post apocalyptic world! Use towers, tactical powers and more unique mechanics to defend your base from the zombies at all cost!

name: A Date with Death
description: Fight against and romance the one hunting for your soul in A Date with Death, a chat simulator visual novel where you date the Grim Reaper himself. Create your own character, decorate your apartment, and chat away with the charming yet dangerous Grim Reaper through fully voiced video calls.

name: Tarmac Legends
description: After an intense race with a stranger turns fatal, driver Aaron Mitchell is put in prison for 25 years for a murder he didn't commit. When the police find new evidence for the real suspect, Mitchell is promised parole if he works undercover for the S.R.A and catches the true killer.

name: Drug Lord Tycoon
description: Start from nothing and rise to the top as you expand your criminal empire in Drug Lord Tycoon.

name: Keep the Lights On
description: Keep the Lights On is an atmospheric horror game where you step in the shoes of Edmund Rosental, a private detective, who is tasked with investigating an old abbey and the mystery surrounding it. Will he be able to keep the lights on or will he succumb to the darkness

name: Unmanned: Midnight Nightmare
description: Welcome to Megan’s Mall, the place where dreams come true! It’s your first day on the job as a security guard, and it’s going to be an experience you’ll never forget.

name: Sender
description: The winds of the frozen wasteland are calling in this atmospheric horror game. Operate an aging vehicle to locate the missing driver of the previous expedition. Be careful not to stray from the path...

name: Survivter
description: Survivter is a roguelike first-person shooter where you no longer have to press a button to make your weapon fire, it shoots itself as long as there are enemies in the room. The gameplay consists of dodging enemies and upgrade character.

name: King Story: Prologue
description: A storm of darkness is taking over the world. Adventure in search of your quest escaping the demon darkness that chases you. Upgrade your items to progress through the maze like environment in this Metroidvania-like challenge. Can you find a Hermit's lost son in your quest to save the world?

name: Scroomage
description: Destroy property, kill companies, run fast, and punch opposing workers in this fast-paced first person shooter.

name: Dollar
description:
In Dollar the player takes the role of a female police officer who has to solve a tough case: The murder of Elisabeth Lindberg who has been found in the men's room of a hotel in Stockholm. After her father's death she took over the business, much to the disapproval of some employees and relatives. She's also a former model and has been recently divorced from a famous pop star. This means there are a lot of suspects around...

The player takes the role of the supervisor and never leaves his office - exceptions are the interrogations which he is also responsible for; his two assistants are specialised in forensics and general investigations. The player gives his orders by stamping fields on the various info sheets, e.g. to to execute a search warrant he opens the house sheet and drags & drops the stamp on the corresponding field. After a short while he receives the results in an e-mail - every time new information arrive these can be directly accessed by clicking on a symbol in the upper left corner.

The player also has four other tools to his disposal which help him solving the case. The phone is used to call three people: The managing inspector who gives hints when stuck, the district attorney to receive search warrants and a journalist who can give important additional information. A special board is dedicated to show the relationships of all suspects to the victim or to each other. Here the player also orders the surveillance of a suspect. The computer has a timeline of the crime saved which is used to find discrepancies in the statements of the suspects and unaccounted time. Finally the map shows all locations which are relevant to the investigation.

Before the interrogations the player has to choose up to three topics. He often has the choice between a nice and a confrontational statement. While the latter may bring more information it can also offend the suspect and lead him to stop the conversation. It is, however, not possible to get stuck because of that.

name: Quintus and the Formidable Curse
description: ‘Quintus and the Formidable Curse’ is a Horror-Adventure game with a difference; the protagonists are a Man and Mouse duo!

name: Bucky's Grounds
description: Bucky's Grounds is a first-person Retro style mascot horror game, where you uncover the dark truth of a mysterious town within another dimension, visit the Khancoban playground while avoiding the sweet toothed rabbit who despises yellow light.

name: Home: A Story of Light
description: Home: A Story of Light is a narrative-driven point and click adventure game that follows Grayson, the son of a great inventor. Alongside his devoted pet mouse, he struggles to make his way through the perilous north-east of Victorian England.

name: Append
description: Destroy friends or strangers in this online multiplayer bullet heaven/hell shooter. Collect powerups, combine weapons, build your defenses and obliterate the opposition. Hundreds of weapon combinations and multiple game modes.

name: Straftat
description: 1v1 Online Medium paced FPS with somewhat retro graphics from the early 2000' era.

name: Voxel Mage: Siege
description: Voxel Mage is a cross-platform, multiplayer, voxel destruction party game! Grab some friends, play against others online, or enjoy offline matches against AI in this game of magic mayhem that packs a serious punch!

name: Clash of Stars
description: MMO Real-time strategy star game.

name: Welcome to Mars 9
description: "Welcome To Mars 9: The Tale Of River" is a classic graphic adventure game where you will navigate a luxurious space station orbiting Mars, uncovering dark secrets and making ethical choices. The game's pixel art creates a captivating world with multiple endings, offering a journey of self-discovery

name: Breaking Friendships
description: A relaxing social game for two people. Use the knowledge about your friend to generate electricity for time-traveling residents.

name: Adam
description: Adam is a sci-fi based Rogue-like FPS game. High action and adventure await you in this futuristic universe. Fight by living the story of Yavuz with various weapons and excellent environments!

name: Gate One
description: Survive with your team as long as possible and discover different worlds with different loot.

name: TTA 1
description: Tower Test Area is a classical tower defense game with puzzle elements. Build towers to defend yourself against the attacking enemies. Can you beat every level on hard? How far can you get inside Monster Power?

name: Neverending Check-in: The Hotel Stories
description: Immerse yourself in The Neverending Check-In: The Hotel Stories, a pixel RPG filled with mystery, quests, cats, humor and life universe. Rebuild a once-glorious hotel and uncover its secret past in this captivating journey of deep plots, lively characters, and abundant quests.

name: Raw Nerve
description: Raw Nerve is an easy-to-play, hard-to-master driving sandbox set in a psychedelic galaxy. Take a casual rip or sprint to the summit for a top time. It’s one truckin' awesome ride.

name: Frontera
description: Frontera is a fantasy city builder and colony sim where you start with a small camp at the edge of a dark forest. Build up your settlement and economy to attract more settlers. Form a military to clear the forest, and claim it for yourself!

name: Cryptid
description: Cryptid is a single-player horror fps game that chronicles an experienced hunter and a creature's encounter from the perspective of the Body Cam.

name: Harpoon Reef Hunter
description: First-Person underwater fishing game that takes you from colorful coral reefs to the depths of the open sea to discover all the species of fish. Become a seasoned harpoon hunter by upgrading your equipment to find the rarest fish out there.

name: Road Dealer Simulator
description: Step into the shoes of a dishonest car dealer. Cheats customers by selling them damaged cars for a high price. In this mission, your loyal dog is invaluable in helping you repair everything that's broken and also deterring unhappy customers. Will you be able to become the king of car trading?

name: This Grand Life 2
description: A money-focused life simulator. Create characters with allergies and addictions. Manage their lives through financial booms and busts. Advance their careers, start a small business, invest in real estate and stocks - or roleplay a penniless hobo.

name: Symphony of Souls
description: Save your beloved from the clutches of the God of the Dead! Symphony of Souls is a rhythm-based platformer about the Greek myth of Orpheus. Traverse the Underworld attempting to reach your goal to the beats of the music. Your performance also affects it, unlocking more elements the better you play!

name: Terminate: Study X
description: Become the machine, find out what happened in New Sapiens and eradicate the infected in a single player first-person shooter campaign of horror and gore.

name: Pirateer: High Seas
description: Piracy has never been this fun! Sail the high seas, plundering booty. Start off in a small ship that you can use to ram other ships to plunder their gold. As you explore and discover new locations, you can upgrade your ships features or even buy a new one. The choice is yours.

name: Choice of Life: Wild Islands
description: Conquer the jungle and prove that in any situation you - the master of your destiny!

name: Project Glasloc
description: Project Glasloc is a co-operative horror game playable for up to 5 Volunteers. Work together to survive dives into old facilities trying to acquire and upload important data for our glorious organization. Nothing could possibly go wrong and don't worry about the employee turn-over rates.

name: Dimhaven Enigmas
description: After several years, the team behind Quern - Undying Thoughts is back with new mysteries to unfold. Explore Dimhaven, solve mind-bending puzzles and uncover the truth behind the Ravenwood legacy in this first-person adventure.

name: Golf: Hole in One
description: Score in just one stroke in this singleplayer, minimalist golf puzzle game. You don't need friends or the internet, just play and relax with anytime with the game!

name: Exterminators of Saturn
description: A top down, twin stick shooter inspired by classic retro arcade games with loads of enemies, fast paced bullet hell combat, big boss battles and tons of weapon customizations.

name: Treasure Hunter: History of Monastery Gold
description: Treasure Hunter is a Metal Detecting Simulator, with lots of humorous quests and exciting storyline based on true event. With 250 thousand findings on the map and big open world.

name: A Shadow Cast on Water
description: Set in 1920s Arkham, you play as a private investigator trying to solve a mysterious case. Can you uncover the conspiracy that's befalling the city?

name: Novus Orbis
description: A combo-based deckbuilding roguelike through a space-time loop: collect cards, receive blessings, add pets to your party, and grow stronger. Chain together cards in the right order for max power, and act before the enemy does. Build synergistic decks, find many secrets, and make BIG numbers!

name: Bot Crafter
description: Construct, maintain, manage and upgrade the fleet of your space robots in this sandbox crafter. Gather resources, automate your base, develop new technologies and face the challanges of the foreign exoplanet. Use your engineering skills to survive, solve problems and conquere the New Home.

name: Predefined
description: Predefined is a 3D puzzle game where planning is key. Navigate a burrow through levels filled with puzzles and obstacles. Enjoy Twitch Integration for interactive gameplay and community collaboration.

name: Simply Cubic
description: Draw a route to where you want to the black cube to go. Take care to draw by anticipating what may happen after starting the route. Remember, your right to draw a route is limited. Make good use of these rights!

name: Colossal Cave VR
description: Acclaimed game designer Roberta Williams revives Colossal Cave as a retro, point-&-click, cave exploration puzzler. Based on the original 1970’s design by Will Crowther & Don Woods this VR update maintains its vintage charm, while revitalizing it for modern gamers.

name: Kromlech
description: Embark on a journey in this dark fantasy action-adventure game to find out why the tapestry of the world is suddenly unraveling itself and even the gods themselves seem powerless to stop it. Sharpen your blade, gather your companions, and prepare to make the last stand as the world around you burns.

name: Desktop Mark
description: Desktop Mark is a simple minigame-centric idler revolving around the goofy character of Mark, a smiley that bounces all around your screen. Every so often, Mark hits the corner and prompts you to procrastinate & have some fun with Mark.

name: Cursed Bet
description: Cursed Bet is a horror game where you play from a body camera perspective. Tackle a cursed doll as you delve into the creepy story of the abandoned preschool you entered to record a videos for a bet.

name: Realms of Flow
description: Calm your mind and drift away in soothing experiences with unique moods and atmospheres. The application combines cinematic visuals with interactive elements for breathing, mindful listening, humming, frequency entrainment and playfulness. Experience the infinite Realms of Flow!

name: Blinding Oversight
description: You play as Emma, who wakes up in an abandoned house without any prior memory of how she ended up there. Investigate your surroundings, uncover the mysteries of the house and connect memories from your past in this first person atmospheric horror game.

name: Settlemoon
description: After the moon vanished, the fantasy game world of Settlemoon lays abandoned in darkness. Re-light the skies, provide rest and resources for travelling adventurers, and piece together what happened to the world.

name: The Isolated Town
description: Shoot down enemies and avoid danger in an attempt to save your new friends on a grand adventure!

name: Torn
description: Join an all-out sci-fi vehicular warfare using all possible variations of battle technologies including robots, tanks, wheeled machines, hovers mounted with deadly weapons that can be combined in hundreds of different ways.

name: Veiled Edge
description: Veiled Edge is a dynamic cyberpunk action-adventure platformer featuring multi-genre gameplay and innovative hacking mechanics. Dive, hack, and adapt your abilities to uncover the secrets of Full-Dive technology in a thrilling journey through virtual worlds.

name: The Cannon Fighters
description: The Cannon Fighters is an action game with fully destructible environments. Experience loads of fun alone or with friends! Randomly generated levels in various environments await you for even greater entertainment. Gain experience and show that you belong among the best!

name: Chronautical
description: In this narrative-driven sci-fi mystery, investigate across space and time to uncover clues and unravel the secrets of a star system that has disappeared, and the man trying to find it.

name: Overhours
description: From building makeshift traps, to defending her new friends from danger and taking back precious time. Overhours is a single-player action tower defense game set in a dystopian media agency that steals time. One employee, together with an unexpected ghostly partner, is trying to retrieve it all.

name: Aquarium Designer: Amazonia
description: In Aquarium Designer: Amazonia DLC, you could create new or redecorate existing aquariums with new exotic items straight from one of the longest rivers, Amazon! Admire fish native to this region and watch them get along with the others!

name: Limit Choice
description: In this game, a wide variety of unique cards will make their appearance, each wielding diverse skills to support your battles. With every confrontation against enemies and overcoming of difficult trials, your deck evolves, gaining ever-increasing power.

name: Venus One: Galactic Overlords
description: Outwit or perish in VOGO, a thrilling turn-based strategy game. In every move, you have a chance to surround more territory and destroy more structures than your opponent. But be careful, because every move can also be a trap. Outsmart your rival and claim victory in VOGO!

name: Staircase55
description: An atmospheric psychological horror game that plunges you into an anomalous, paradoxical stairwell. Equipped only with a flashlight, navigate the procedurally generated abyss and face the ever-adapting AI. Unravel the mysteries of SCP-087 in this unique horror experience.

name: Freeman
description: Freeman - Immersive sim shooter in Sci-fi setting. Chased by pursuers, without a penny behind his back, but with fire in his eyes! Destroy enemies on planets and in space, travel, save friends and punish enemies!

name: The Mildew Children
description: Featuring a blend of 2D adventure and visual novel, The Mildew Children is a grim tale about a village inhabited only by children who follow savage pagan traditions. A young witch named Kyrphel, along with her sisters, are bound to perform a macabre Ritual in order to save their village.

name: Medical Shift: The Emergency Room Simulator
description: In "Medical Shift" you become a dedicated doctor in the emergency room, responsible for diagnosing, treating, and saving lives. This professional simulation offers an immersive experience of the challenges and rewards of working in a fast-paced medical environment.

name: The Cursed Oasis
description: A relaxing first-person exploration game. Trapped in a mysterious, uninhabited oasis, you must follow the clues and break the curse before it's too late!

name: RoundRunners Playground
description: Play tag-like gamemodes with a chance of random effects to happen. Roll, climb and bunnyhop to dodge fellow roundrunners as you’re trying not to get tagged. Face up against your friends or randoms in this easy-to-pick-up game. Make the map your playground.

name: Sneaky Seekers
description: Sneak into the shadows and, using your pickaxe, try to find the treasure hidden around the map, but beware: you're not alone, and your friends will do anything to get in your way! So be the smartest, and strike first.

name: Rogue Day
description: Rogue Day is a open world city simulator in third person view where you play as a super hero. There are two cities to explore.

name: Panel Rabbit
description: Flash! Puzzle Action！ Place the panels on the ground and Guide the rabbit safely to the goal!

name: Deep Blue Fantasy
description: Deep Blue Fantasy is a roguelike adventure game set in an underwater world. Collect weapons, recruit crew, hold the lucky dice in your hand, and embark on a journey into the unpredictable depths of the sea!

name: Cecil Hollow
description: Venture to Cecil Hollow and investigate the strange events that have driven away the previous owners. Cecil Hollow is a sci-fi horror game with a rich atmosphere set in modern day Kentucky.

name: Neon Parkour 2
description: Control a blue cube and complete challenging trails and puzzles to reach the target! Red cubes that will destroy you the moment you touch them! Help the blue cube reach its destination in Neon Parkour, which has a minimal design. Jump, dash and swing to solve challenging trails!

name: Sakura in Paris
description: “Sakura in Paris” is a Romantic Comedy Visual Novel and Yuri Dating Sim. Play as Sakura Maeda as she travels to Paris, learns about her father and, if everything goes right, may fall in love with the woman of her dreams along the way.

name: Yume Memory
description: A relaxing Match Two Minigame featuring Anime Characters from the Works of Yume Creations.

name: Michael Jackson's Moonwalker
description: Michael Jackson's Moonwalker is an arcade video game by Sega (programming) and Triumph International (audiovisuals), with the help of Jackson which was released on the Sega System 18 hardware. The arcade has distinctively different gameplay from its computer and console counterparts, focusing more on beat 'em up gameplay elements rather than platform gameplay.

name: Re: Be
description: Re:Be is a story-based action RPG 2D platformer game. In Re:Be, you become the protagonist and embark on a lengthy adventure to find the people who suddenly disappeared in an increasingly contaminated Earth.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Outlaw Pack 1
description: This Outlaw Pack includes (2) Outlaw type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 275 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars.

name: Ramen Oil Pecking Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to collect oil floating in a bowl of ramen by pulling it with chopsticks? This game will completely satisfy your desire to do so!

name: Towerful Defense: A Rogue TD
description: Towerful Defense: A Rogue TD is a roguelike tower defense game. You have one tower and a few skills that you must use wisely to fight off waves of ever-growing enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades, and items to craft your unique and powerful builds.

name: Space Entity
description: Space Entity is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. A entity is within the space ship. Get the power back on and use the escape pods to live on.

name: Paragon Pioneers 2
description: Paragon Pioneers 2 is a city-building idle game in which you discover, conquer and then build on islands to fulfill the needs of your inhabitants. Even with limited time to play you can enjoy this deep simulation game and follow one of the countless ways to optimize your empire.

name: Frostfall
description: A deadly pandemic leaves you suddenly stranded in the arctic north with no way home. With enough supplies for just a few days, you must venture out into the unforgiving cold, and embrace the unknown.

name: Monster Tiles TD
description: A unique roguelike tower defense game featuring epic battles between fierce (but cute!) monsters and medieval space pirates! Expand and defend your base by choosing where to place a new randomly generated path tile after each wave. Strategy and planning is key, but every game is different!

name: Zero Below the Sun
description: Classic survival horror reimagined with a retro look and modern feel, set in a top secret underground research facility in Antarctica.

name: Rescue Contest
description: The circus gained popularity with impressive acts, like turning pigs into barbecue, captivating and attracting large crowds. However, due to financial crisis, the circus had to close and the director decided to sell the animals.

name: Tropity
description: Tropity is an open-world island where you can do anything and everything. From building cool functional houses where all the furniture works and serves a purpose, Getting a job that is fully interactable and immersive, Or your own in-game business doing anything you want? It's all here at Tropity!

name: Cursorblade
description: Cursorblade is an action arcade game where you play as a cursor that fights your way through waves of enemies. Combine weapons and items to be more powerful with your own unique builds. Slash, dodge, upgrade and repeat!

name: Mitrapunk
description: Manage software development in huge organization. Select most promising features, negotiate about architecture and ownership, build features and get promoted. All processes are similar to real development in FAANG.

name: Otherworld Hero
description: In this turn-based tactical RPG you will take control of a hero from a different time and place, plucked out of their own reality. And now... meet the expectations of the people and become the all beloved hero or forge your own path and reshape the world to whatever your taste is.

name: Forsaken Quartet
description: Humanity has gone nearly extinct. Only four humans remain—two men and two women, desperate to survive on a floating island. As they spend more time together, arguments on how to move forward threaten to drive the four of them apart.

name: Abyss Dive
description: Abyss Dive is a 2D side-view game where the player as a diver explores the ocean and with the help of his harpoon, can break air shells, fend off underwater monsters, and also fight his way to a mysterious treasure!

name: A Bad Day for a Hangover
description: You awaken with the worst of hangovers in a nuclear bunker with supplies running low, the only chance of survival is to scavenge for tinned goods in the robot infested nuclear wasteland above before the town is nuked again

name: Sensory Deprivation
description: This is a visual novel. The theme at the center of the story is what consciousness is. Your task in the game is to understand the essence of being. The main character is a successful, intelligent man who designs humanoid robots. He tries to understand if robots have consciousness.

name: Feeble Light
description: Blast off as a little star trying to rid the cosmos of angry celestial beings in Feeble Light, a 3-tone pixel art shoot’em up where minimalistic presentation makes way for precision controls and fluid animation!

name: Battle Store
description: Battle store - IDLE game where you take management of a small street food point under your control. Watch your employee work, gain money and upgrade your store!

name: Tendrils And Plates
description: Tendrils and Plates is an Open World Sci-Fi Space Survival Shooter RPG under development by a solo indie developer. You begin in a scout starship and learn to survive in a hostile solar system. Build your base and take on missions in space and on numerous ground locations.

name: Fear of Neighbours
description: Fear of Neighbours is a psychological horror game that puts you in the shoes of a resident in a quiet Finnish neighbourhood.

name: Aviophobia
description: In Aviophobia, you take on the role of a airline passenger who suddenly is all alone. Or is he? After a large part of the power supply has failed, you quickly realize that something isn't right. Now it's up to you to find out what's going on here and how to get off this plane as fast as possible.

name: Azoove
description: Adventure with friends in this co-op card roguelike, bravely crossing the dangerous Azoove desert. Manage resources and communicate effectively to survive the journey and return the cursed book to the Library. Strategize and make it there in time to seal the evil fiend Ur'gan!

name: Survivor's guilt
description: A great earthquake with a magnitude of 9.2 occurred. The day when rescue arrives is unknown. Make full use of your smart phone and the supplies you have left, and continue to fight against the hunger and fear that is attacking you.

name: Midnight Door
description: A girl befriends a strange and powerful creature; the duo goes on an interdimensional adventure in this 16-bit inspired top-down action-adventure! Explore environments both familiar and fantastical while engaging in precise and strategic combat with bizarre creatures.

name: Kiss Before Midnight
description:
This dating simulation revolves around a group of nine people whose stories are all intertwined in the city of love, Paris. Paul has returned to his friends Amelie and Ricky after one year of studying in Berlin, and is thrilled to see his old crush Devine again, although he's less thrilled about her getting married to macho Vincent in a few days. Ricky is interested in Luca, the red-haired waitress at the clique's favorite café, while Amelie would like to get closer to her former professor Marcel Benoît. Amelie's fashion-conscious and manipulative twin sister Estelle and flower girl Marie will also play their part.

Taking control of these characters throughout 15 episodes, players influence the relationships between them, mainly by choosing what they say in conversations. Some characters occasionally have to be dressed for a specific event in a mini game, while a second, more frequent mini game allows characters to tip the mood or topic of a conversation in their favor by using cards representing certain gestures. In the end, the player's actions through all episodes will determine who hooks up with whom.

name: Earthen Dragon
description: The nameless dragon has left his valley to save a friend, but the lands beyond lie in ruin.

name: The Lara Croft Collection
description: Lara Croft makes her Nintendo Switch debut with two Tomb Raider adventures in one treasure-packed bundle, featuring non-stop arcade combat and 2-4 player co-op.

name: Warship Fury
description: Meet a truly legendary MMO shooter for your mobile device! Become part of a community of millions of players from across the world, take a warship into your first massive sea battle, fight in a 5x5 format, and win! Check out the extraordinary variety of warships, maps, modes, and possible strategies that this warship shooter game has to offer!

name: Chicken Brother
description: Exploring in the huge sinkhole, you can transform from a chicken to a muscle man, by jumping, gliding and climbing from the bottom of the sinkhole to the outside world.

name: Leaf Fragments
description: A war chess game that showcases the differences in the systems of different countries.

name: Dakkan! Monster no Shima
description: Sin descripción

name: Angel Link
description: Angel Li is a Flash game featuring matching. Connect identical cards to eliminate them. The operation is easy. Elements of beautiful girls enhance the adventure in a different world.

name: Anti Japanese Heroes
description: This is a horizontal action game with 6 optional characters, including Farmer, Martial Monk, Qigong Master, Eighth Route, Secret Service, and King of Slingshot. Faced with countless invaders, can you kill all the enemies or end the game?

name: Circle Killer
description: play the role of "circle" to avoid incoming blocks with rhythmic music now have two different levels Fall Level: Accompanied by dynamic music you will move freely around the area, avoiding falling blocks Traversal Level: You will continue traversing a section of road with rhythmic music

name: Journey to the West Survivor
description: "Survivor of Journey to the West" is a journey to the West fairy theme of relaxed, happy, survival rogue, survivor like games. You can choose from 12 characters of varying abilities, and you can combine various gameplay and genres in over 200 massive skills and resonances

name: Love Yuri
description: Shu Yu, a popular writer, became sisters with Lu Xi, an online voice actress. But when Lu Xi accidentally discovers that her favorite yuri author is actually her sister Shu Yu, she becomes increasingly attracted to Shu Yu's personality and a forbidden romance gradually unfolds between them...

name: Anata ga Ookami Card Death!
description: Accuse and execute the owner of the werewolf card. It's a 5-minute round of a repeated death game in the werewolf genre.

name: Zeta Leporis RTS
description: A sci-fi real-time strategy game. An existential war among asteroids in classic RTS style. Build and defend, produce and upgrade, attack and annihilate!

name: Zombie Survival Game Online
description: In ZSGO, you and your fellow survivors wield the ingenuity, firepower, and courage to navigate a post-apocalyptic world crawling with the living dead. Treacherous landscapes, hidden resources, and untold stories waiting to be discovered! But remember, you are never safe – stay vigilant and keep your guard up, or risk being consumed by the horrors of ZSGO… Can you survive our experience? Craft your story today!

name: Backpack Battles
description: The inventory management auto battler! Buy rare and legendary items to build powerful setups. Then battle other players with it.

name: Trainz Plus: Yellowstone Mountain & Central Railroad
description: Set in the Yellowstone Mountains of Wyoming, this 55km long route offers a range of operations, including coal, iron ore, limestone, and steel. Complete with four sessions and a multiplayer session, there is plenty to explore on this route.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Yellowstone Mountain & Central Railroad
description: Set in the Yellowstone Mountains of Wyoming, this 55km long route offers a range of operations, including coal, iron ore, limestone, and steel. Complete with four sessions and a multiplayer session, there is plenty to explore on this route.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Yellowstone Mountain & Central Railroad
description: Set in the Yellowstone Mountains of Wyoming, this 55km long route offers a range of operations, including coal, iron ore, limestone, and steel. Complete with four sessions and a multiplayer session, there is plenty to explore on this route.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Alternate World Diego
description: Wryyy! Stop your enemies in time with the ultimate stand, The World, wielded by Diego Brando! Take your game to a whole other universe with Diego's new found abilities! Available now!

name: Chrono Crystal: Hubert
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Chrono Crystal: Archie
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3: Off-Road DLC
description: Your shift in Autobahn Police Simulator 3 continues - with the new „Off-Road“ DLC!

name: Flowerpeer
description: Sin descripción

name: Kage-chara Love-Com
description: Sin descripción

name: 1007 Bolts
description:
So you've pissed off the Gods... Now what?

Your options are limited. You can beg for mercy or try bargaining with the devil. Maybe standing around in a puddle of your own making is more your style. However, while you're mulling over your choices, you may want to watch your step because today, lightning will strike the same place more than once!

Your goal is to simply live until the next day. To avoid being smited, move left or right. Nothing else will work. You do happen to have the power to stop time with the Start button. Survive long enough and the gods will become even more furious!

name: Small House
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortal Kombat Project
description: A Mortal Kombat fan game made on Mugen.

name: Escape from the Room with my Kouhai
description:
Escape from the Room with my Kōhai Game is an escape game based on the Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro series. The game was made by the original author Nanashi in RPG Maker and released on Pixiv, just one year prior to the mangas official release date.
The game was also translated into English on July 21, 2018.

name: Wand of Fortune R for Nintendo Switch
description:
Port of Wand of Fortune R for Nintendo Switch.

Lulu is a student of a magic school, but is actually a trouble student. Because of her poor magic skills and continual troubles, she was forced to transfer to a different school. She happily joined the new school, but soon discovered a shocking fact... She doesn't have an attribute as a magical girl! If she can't find her attribute before she graduates, her magic power will need to be sealed... Well, will she be able to find it...?

name: Wand of Fortune R for Nintendo Switch: Limited Edition
description:
Limited Edition of the Nintendo Switch port of Wand of Fortune R. This edition comes with an exclusive bonus booklet and six character cards.

Lulu is a student of a magic school, but is actually a trouble student. Because of her poor magic skills and continual troubles, she was forced to transfer to a different school. She happily joined the new school, but soon discovered a shocking fact... She doesn't have an attribute as a magical girl! If she can't find her attribute before she graduates, her magic power will need to be sealed... Well, will she be able to find it...?

name: Radiant Tale: Special Edition
description:
The special edition of Radiant Tale comes with a special booklet and a drama CD.

Today's customers at Rebel where Tifalia works, are a unique group of people who called themselves the Circus.

Their first performance was not a success. Tifalia forces to join as an assistant and producer after hearing "What is lacking in the current Circus is mediocre like you!" She was worried all night wondering how she going on a journey, but with her family's words, she decided to participate.

A crazy dragon that loves to tickle, a spikey clown that doesn't make you laugh, a water creature who doesn't want to use water magic, an acrobat who doesn't know how to entertain, a drunkard furball, an unmotivated leader, and an amateur producer who just joined.

Will they be able to perform successfully in front of crowds?

name: Semicolon Island
description: Semicolon Island is a multiplayer-focused sandbox building game, which aims to give its players large amounts of freedom to create anything their minds can come up with.

name: Aikagi
description: Sunohara Nozomu finds himself at his wits' end when his parents told him to move out on his own to learn how to become more independent, but he's having trouble finding a place that feels like home. That's when his childhood friend, Takanashi Shiori, gives the conflicted Nozomu a shocking request...

name: Pokémon Medallion Battle
description:
Pokémon Medallion Battle is a spin-off Pokémon game on Facebook Gaming developed by GCTurbo. It was released in selected Asian countries on December 23, 2019 following an open beta in the Philippines beginning on November 20, 2019. It is available in five languages: English, Malaysian, Indonesian, Thai, and Traditional Chinese.

In Pokémon Medallion Battle, two players face off with teams consisting of six Pokémon. Up to two of these Pokémon may either be Great Ball or Ultra Ball tier; this amount increases as players progress through the various Gyms. In addition, no two Pokémon from the same evolutionary family may be used simultaneously, and no more than two Legendary Pokémon (as indicated by a Crown at the top of each medal) per team.

Players take turns playing Pokémon from their Bench face down; their tier is visible on the back of the medallion, putting the player who goes first at a disadvantage. On the first turn, the player with the higher Rating goes first; otherwise, the winner of the previous turn goes first. After both medallions are played, they are turned face up and any applicable powers activate. Once a power is activated, it cannot be used again for the remainder of the match.

The Pokémon with the higher CP wins the fight, scoring their side a point. The player who goes first wins any tie. The first player to score 3 points wins the match.

name: Solo Joe
description: A rock climbing rpg.

name: Phantom of Zana
description: Swing, dash, slide and slice your way through this retro style 2D side scrolling platformer! Blast, hack and slash your opponents or bounce off their heads! Power up Fantastic Fania to finally confront the Phantom of Zana!

name: Mage Kanade’s Futanari Dungeon Quest
description: Taking up a request to hunt demons, Mage Kanade arrives at a dungeon. However, she was turned into a futanari. In order to return safely from a dungeon full of milking traps, Kanade confronts the monsters…

name: Aikagi After Days
description: Aikagi After Days is the Steam release of the kinetic novel that depicts a young couple enjoying their college life together. If you enjoyed their blossoming love story in Aikagi, you will love this summer full of dates, swimming, fireworks, travel... and maybe just some studying.
