name: Nausicaä's Close Call
description: A Japanese shoot 'em up video game developed and published by Technopolis Soft for the NEC PC-6001.

name: Velberan In Miracle World
description: In this adventure, Velberan is in search of his dog Bolt. This game is a platformer inspired by the universe of Velberan.

name: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
description: An adventure game developed by Technopolis Soft for the NEC PC-8801.

name: Never Forget to Nausicaä Game Forever
description: The third game based off Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind, Never Forget to Nausicaä Game Forever was released for the MSX and is the most well-known of the releases and has been frequently and erroneously referred to as a game where the player kills the Ohmu.

name: Aikagi 2
description: Aikagi 2 is a console port of the love story between the protagonist and his childhood friend, Ayano Sumeragi, who started living together after not seeing her attending school this semester and seeing her living the NEET life, focused on playing video games, with your objective is to help her wake up and study.

name: Mood
description: Sin descripción

name: Error Map not Found
description: Sin descripción

name: Time Destroys Everything
description: Sin descripción

name: Dride
description: Sin descripción

name: At Doom's Trigger
description: Sin descripción

name: Stratosphere Fight
description: Sin descripción

name: Kirby Star Ride
description: Kirby Star Ride is a Flash game made by 4Kids as a promotion for Kirby: Right Back at Ya!. The game was only up for 1 year before being delisted from the website. The game is currently lost, with 0 information about the game surviving online apart from it's existence.

name: Aster Tatariqus
description:
Find your destiny in love, friendship, or family in the newest tactical RPG from Studio FgG!
Scheduled for release in 2023, Aster Tatariqus is a high fantasy smartphone game with tactical battles and an immersive story!

name: Aikagi 3
description: Aikagi 3 is a console port for the Nintendo Switch.

name: Dobuki's Epic Journey
description: Embark on Dobuki's whimsical quest across three vibrant planets. Solve clever puzzles, battle quirky enemies, and save the galaxy from the clutches of Emperor Lik Wang in this charming blend of point-and-click adventure and RPG elements.

name: Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe Memory Match-Up
description: Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe Memory Match-Up is a web game by Nintendo made to promote Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe.

name: Kikimora's Clean-Up
description: Released in Vol 7, Kikimora's Clean-Up puts players in the role of Kikimora, who must completely sweep floors while facing a time limit. This game is similar to Pac-Man in nature.

name: Aikagi Complete Box
description: Aikagi Complete Box is a bundle that includes Aikagi, Aikagi After Days, Aikagi 2 and Aikagi 3.

name: Kinder World
description: Kinder World is more than a cozy houseplant game.

name: Minecraft: The Incredibles
description: Step into the boots of the Incredibles and dive mask first into a Supers playground! Suit up and play together as Mr. & Mrs. Incredible, Frozone, Violet & Dash to save Municiberg with their incredible powers. Explore the city, bring down the Omnidroid, battle The Underminer and stop Screenslaver's hypnotic schemes. Defeat them all to make Supers legal again!

name: My Little Sister's Special Place
description: Our hero used to go to Akiba a lot when he was younger. It wasn't to have fun, but for his little sister's sake. One day, his younger sister is gifted a Christmas trip, and they spend time together as if they're a couple. This is the delightful and touching love story of these two siblings.

name: Pac-Man 12-in-1 Legacy Series
description: Pac-Man 12-in-1 Legacy Series is an arcade machine bundle by Arcade1Up that features various arcade games from Namco.

name: Daimadou Senryaku Monogatari '95
description: A revision of Bayoeen Wars that features balance and aesthetic changes while also restricting the manner in which the player can select opponents.

name: Angry Birds Power Trouble
description: While the birds are sleeping, a pig wizard arrives and steals the bird's powers and their eggs too! While powerless, the flock must get their eggs and their powers back! Will they get their power's back, or will they be lost forever?

name: Madou Sugoroku
description: Released in Disc Station Vol 9, Madou Sugoroku is a board game in which characters pair up and compete.

name: Arle's Travel Log
description: Released in Disc Station Vol 13, Arle's Travel Log is a text-adventure game where Arle is confronted by Satan on her way to magic school, who wants Carbuncle back. The three battling together accidentally cause them to be sent back in time, with Arle and Carbuncle looking for a way to return to the present. The gameplay consists of exploration similar to the Madou Monogatari series, along with elements of an adventure game. Arle can talk to characters she meets or can click on various items to progress the plot. Battles can also occur in-game, and are fought by using a click-and-point system. The game casts various Madou Monogatari and Disc Station characters as Japanese historical figures.

name: De Blob: Utrecht
description: A UFO is flying through space near Earth and Saturn, but it collides with an asteroid within the asteroid field. It crashes into the HQ of I.N.K.T. in Utrecht, but the occupant escapes the crash using a parachute. He is then surrounded by I.N.K.T. forces but tries to escape...

name: Rulue's Iron-Fist Spring Break
description:
Released in Vol 14, Rulue's Iron-Fist Spring Break is a visual novel starring Rulue. She is tasked to complete one of three objectives over her spring break: Find the five divine treasures, explore the "wonderful land," or gather ingredients for a recipe.

This game is mentioned, using the fan title of "Rulue's Spring Break of Fists", in Sega 3D Classics Collection's English-language manual for Puyo Puyo Tsu.

name: Puyoman-Eating Carbuncle
description: Released in Disc Station volume 14.

name: White-Hot Puyolympic!
description: White-Hot PuyoLympic is a sports game in which Arle and Witch battle in several varied events.

name: White-Hot! Puyolympic! in Bazaru
description: PuyoLympic in Basa~ru is an expansion of the Puyo Picking game featured in PuyoLympic.

name: Serilly's Happy Birthday
description: Released in Disc Station Vol 18, Serilly's Happy Birthday is a simulation game starring Serilly.

name: Madou Run
description: Released in Disc Station Vol 19, Madou Run is similar to the game of tag; players that obtain a bowl of curry have the ability to attack other players.

name: Battlefield Waltz
description: Battlefield Waltz tells the story of village girl Ran, who obtained massive power from a cursed magic sword after losing her parents and hometown. She ended up at an ultranationalistic military school known as Nirvana. It was a unique school, a country in its own right gathering boys and girls that excelled in combat.

name: SympathyKiss: Special Edition
description:
Otome visual novel by Otomate.

The story of Sympathy Kiss involves the heroine who was working for almost a year at an app development company, and was used to the usual mediocrity of work. However, she is suddenly reassigned to the production department of an app that is about to end its service. She has to choose the ideal partner that will keep the app alive for years to come. Just what awaits her–?!

name: Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate
description: Step into the unknown and embark on an epic, time travel adventure, completely re-imagined. Introducing Wanderer: The Fragments of Fate, a remake of the critically acclaimed VR adventure game - Wanderer. There’s no telling where you’ll go and who you’ll become as you unravel the mysteries of time.

name: Groceries and JumpScares
description: Can you survive the horrors of retail? You are the newest "employee" under contract at the local Soke Co Groceries Store. Manage the amount of stock daily to try to satisfy the on slot of customers. Mark the price up on products to make more profit and buy more stock. All while quelling the hunger of the thing that lurks in the basement. Try to survive and remember the Soke Co Groceries motto. Try Not To Get Eaten!

name: Absolute Instant
description: Spaceship scroll-shooter with teleport mechanics for iOS.

name: Nikita: Speedy Pirates
description: Kart racer developed by Techland. Spin-off game featuring characters seen in Nikita: The Mystery of the Hidden Treasure.

name: Champion Strike: Crypto Arena
description: Champion Strike: Crypto Arena is a 1v1 real-time PvP strategy simulation game with a controllable Champion aspect.

name: My Racing Career
description: My Racing Career is an online web-browser racing management game where you control the professional career of your own driver, beginning in the lower categories of motorsport and slowly climbing to the top to make yourself a name in the racing world.

name: Shinobi, Koi Utsutsu for Nintendo Switch
description:
Port of Shinobi, Koi Utsutsu for the Nintendo Switch.

The heroine, Katagiri Kaede, goes to a ninja school! She lost her parents very young and her grandmother at sixteen and is trying to become a ninja. She attends a local ninjutsu dojo, and one day meets the head of the Sanada Secondary Training Campus (founded by Sanada Yukimura after beating Tokugawa Ieyasu), which trains ninja. He invites her to take a ninja exam, and she agrees, transferring to the school to do a short-term study before taking the test. On her first day, she accidentally uses an advanced technique that makes her male classmates go meromero (lose their heads) over her when her heart thumps!

name: Senjou no Waltz for Nintendo Switch: Limited Edition
description:
Limited edition of the port of Senjou no Waltz for the Nintendo Switch.

Senjou no Waltz tells the story of village girl Ran, who obtained massive power from a cursed magic sword after losing her parents and hometown. She ended up at an ultranationalistic military school known as Nirvana. It was a unique school, a country in its own right gathering boys and girls that excelled in combat.

name: Apricity
description: Chiara leads a solitary life, barred from stepping out during winter due to the mythical dangers that lurk within. But her curiosity gets the better of her, and she escapes to catch a glimpse of the famous Starflake flowers before they disappear when Spring arrives. That's when she stumbles upon the fabled snow spirit, and a strange bond begins to blossom between them...

name: Carreta Furacão: The Legend
description: Carreta Furacão: The Legend is an endless runner based on a group of costume characters who dance and do stunts around the streets that became popular in Brazil at that time, being developed by students of Amazonas State University's Game Lab.

name: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
description: The PC-released version of The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie, a point and click adventure game unrelated to the 3D platformer released on console. SpongeBob and Patrick leave Bikini Bottom and journey to new and unexplored lands. Players join their struggle to defeat Plankton's diabolic scheme to take over the world...Plan Z! Plankton has stolen King Neptune's crown and assumed control of the town of Bikini Bottom, placing the blame squarely on Mr. Krabs. Together, SpongeBob and Patrick must journey to far away Shell City to recover the crown, return to Bikini Bottom and save the town and Mr. Krabs.

name: Fall Into Insanity
description: Fall Into Insanity is a First-Person Atmospheric Horror Game using the power of Unreal Engine 5. Your friends have gone missing under mysterious circumstances and it is up to you to find them. What you find, might just drive you to Insanity.

name: Eight Winds
description: A fast paced, highly technical 3D fighting game with an incredibly high skill ceiling and a large amount of freedom for self-expression

name: Metro
description: A digital implementation of the board game about building the Paris Métro.

name: Retrograde
description: Retrograde is an arcade-style game set in space where players control a space ship and must avoid asteroids by shooting lasers. The objective is to achieve high scores by staying alive for as long as possible. With retro-inspired visuals and audio, the game combines skillful maneuvering, quick reflexes, and strategic decision-making to create an addictive and competitive experience.

name: Akudaikan
description:
Keep a stranglehold on your corrupt office by accepting bribes and using those bribes to hire henchmen, pay for protection and buy traps to snare valiant heroes. These do-gooders will eventually come a-knocking and it's your prerogative to obfuscate and outright beat back their attempts at bringing justice upon your head and hide. Setting traps inside the magistrate building also helps to slow down or completely stop some hapless heroes.

Played in a humorous light, Akudaikan features real Japanese actors, comical scenarios, a few ridiculous moments and wacky mini-games certain to elicit laughs from unsuspecting gamers.

name: Night at the Full Moon Motel
description: Short horror-thriller game for Game Boy. Play a character in need of cash, who is hired to be night manager at a strange motel. Explore the motel and its surroundings to reveal it's secrets, fulfil guests requests and keep them happy because your life could depend on it.

name: Jumperino
description: Discover Jumperino: an easy to learn but hard to master platformer where every jump matters. Plan your jumps carefully: a slight mistake can get you all the way down. Practice makes perfect! Try different jump angles and power, experiment and discover new worlds. There's only one possible way: up! Master the gameplay and you'll master the Moon!

name: Bride of the Nightmare
description: A fantasy that begins when the moon hides in a dream.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Musu
description: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Musu takes place in the year 1996 during a short period of time on April 14th in Skinner's home within a residential neighborhood. The principal of Springfield Elementary School named Seymour Skinner, who lives on and owns his own home in the aforementioned peaceful neighbourhood, has invited Superintendent Chalmers to his home, to enjoy a home-cooked meal of his making. After Superintendent Chalmers arrives, something goes amiss, and things don't go according to plan. Will Seymour be able to salvage this meal as well as Chalmers's perception of him?

name: Comet Summoner Time Trial Version
description: Released in Disc Station Vol 22, Time Trial Version features additional levels.

name: Magic Battle Hasamuncho
description: Released in Disc Station Vol 22, Hasamuncho is a marble puzzle game. Players aim to capture the most marbles, with special powers being available to assist them.

name: Puyo Card
description: Released in Disc Station Vol 23, Puyo Card is a stacking card game. Players place cards onto the middle of the playfield; matching four of the same color will create a chain and damage the opponent.

name: Leaf Trombone: World Stage
description:
Leaf Trombone World Stage is an instrument, a game, and a huge global social experience. You can blow into your iPhone, or use touch mode with iPod touch to make beautiful music. It's that easy! You can practice your favorite songs as much as you like. Then when you feel ready, strut your stuff by performing on the World Stage, Smule's revolutionary new platform where Leaf Trombone lovers around the world can listen to and score your playing.

Leaf Trombone was discontinued in April 2012.

name: Nawatobi suru Carbuncle
description: Released in Disc Station Volume 24.

name: Kaiten Puyoman Kuu Carbuncle
description: Released in Disc Station Volume 25.

name: Restaurant King
description: Restaurant King, released in Disc Station Vol 27 as Disc Station's final game, is a board game featuring Arle alongside several other Disc Station heroes.

name: Shuttlecock Carbuncle
description: Released in Disc Station in 1997.

name: Angel Graffiti S: Anata he no Profile
description: Angel Graffiti S: Anata e no Profile is a simulation game developed by Astrovision and published by Coconuts Japan for the Sega Saturn. It is ported from the PlayStation version, released a year earlier.

name: Heroes of Mythic Might
description: Heroes of Mythic Might is an Idle RPG card game. It will transport you into a fantasy adventure world based on Eastern myths and legends.

name: Clannada: Gensou Shoujo
description: Sin descripción

name: The Stockpile
description: Preparing to move in with your new roommate, you have just a few last things before you can clear out the storage place you rented. While grabbing the last boxes, strange noises leave you wondering: is someone else with you?

name: Duke Burger
description: After saving mankind, Duke Nukem retired. He opened a little restaurant, Duke Burger. And now he is an honest businessman.

name: Refugee: The Second Hearing
description:
Asylum story...

You arrive naive and actually believing.

While they have number of awards from the LA city mayor private organization 'Program For Torture Victims' is no more than a group of Homeland Security employees, exchanging medical services for political opinions, making refugees lie in the court.

name: Beans or Bones
description: A fun 2-player online co-op pirate game for having a good time with your best buddy. Stranded on a cannibal island, your only chance of survival is to make the cannibals like veggie food. Go on quests, fly with birds, paddle in a barrel, and use your bubble shooter to fight sharks.

name: Fatpets
description:
Navigate adorable animals to their goals in Fatpets!
Solve engaging, physics-based puzzles with the strategic use of bubbles.
Easy to pick up, satisfying to master.

name: Watching Blade Runner on a Rainy Night
description: An autobiographical Bitsy game about real and artificial experiences.

name: Hero Online
description: Hero Online is a fast-paced, free-to-play MMORPG from NetGame and MGame USA set in ancient China. It features colorful graphics and martial arts-style combat animations.

name: Wexew Mexem
description:
Wexew Mexem is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up by Japanese developer Zakichi. It takes inspiration from games like Exed Exes and Xexex.

By activating "High Point Mode" when your energy is at full power, you can also destroy enemy bullets, turning enemies into bonus items.
If you press the mode activation button during "high point mode", you will return to normal mode at any time.

Your attack has a range, and if you move up, the range will be longer, and if you move down, the range will be shorter, but the power will be doubled.

name: Silver the Hedgehog: World's Collide
description: "Silver The Hedgehog: World's Collide" is a 2D fangame that revolves around the character, Silver the Hedgehog, inspired by the game "Sonic the Hedgehog (2006)". In this game you play as Silver the Hedgehog as you try to stop Eggman Nega from taking over the world by utilizing Silver's psychokinesis which you can control using your mouse or mouse pad. You must use Silver's psychokinetic powers to defeat enemies and move around platforms and other objects that will help you progress through the many different levels of the game.

name: Pokémon Mezastar
description:
Pokémon Mezastar is an arcade game developed by Takara Tomy A.R.T.S. and Marvelous, which also developed the Pokémon Battrio, Pokémon Tretta, and Pokémon Ga-Olé arcade games. Pokémon Mezastar was officially announced in the May 2020 issue of CoroCoro released on April 15, with more details revealed in a press release on August 12. It was intended to be launched in Japan during summer 2020, but was delayed until September 17 due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

The game incorporates similar features to the developer's previous titles and continues the use of physical peripherals, in this case tags, to operate Pokémon in battles. These battles are conducted with three Pokémon on each side and take place in a variety of environments. Players can capture Pokémon while playing the game, which are dispensed as tags from the machine.

Each Pokémon Mezastar machine consists of two adjacent stations that share a large monitor. This monitor displays the user interface for individual stations, simulating the borders of the display with on-screen graphics while single-player games are in operation. Players can also partake in cooperative battles, during which the interface is expanded to cover both stations. This was previously featured in the arcade title Pokémon: Battle Nine, despite being promoted as a first for a Pokémon arcade machine.

name: Numsol
description: Sin descripción

name: Amoebae
description: Sin descripción

name: FAR: Universe Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Monkey Kick Off
description:
Monkey has been buzzing around doing his Monkey Lander thing for a while now and has decided to drop back down to earth from his little orange spaceship in honour of the 2006 World Cup. In fact, Monkey has gone football crazy, so get those Monkey feet in tip top shape and kick your way to the Monkey Village where all your Monkey friends will be waiting to welcome the longest kicks home!

It's easy to play Monkey kick off - simply click your left mouse button or press any key on your keyboard to have Monkey kick the ball. Remember, you need to time it just right. Here's a hint from Monkey himself:

“It's all about the laws of physics. Think speed and angle for monster kicks.”

This summer, you can also challenge your friends to beat Monkey's best kick. It's easy to do! Simply click on the Challenge Monkey button and send the link to your mates. Send it via e-mail or instant message to that special competitive someone that you really, really want to beat or post the link on your blog to challenge the world! Let your Monkey friends watch your best shot via Monkey's instant replay, and then chuckle as they attempt to beat it themselves.

Let the games begin… and may the best Monkey win!

name: Super Ninji Land
description:
It's a somewhat short and easy hack starring everyone's favorite little ninjas from SMB2!
The Ninji woke up to find their island full of unwanted enemies! Where are they from? Why are they here?

name: Super Ninji Land 2: A Ninji's Journey
description: The sequel to Super Ninji Land. Join Ninji on their quest to find Bowser and learn the truth about his old lab.

name: Garfield Trivia Game
description:
Garfield Trivia Game is a 1 - 2 player Garfield comic related trivia game for the Apple II.

Players can choose to play against the timer or another human opponent in their knowledge of the Garfield comic. There player can choose from 4 of 6 categories of questions for each game, and the player can choose to make their own data disk with custom questions. The player is given a random question from 1 of the 4 categories, and they have a short time frame to answer correctly, earning up to 150 points if answered immediately, but less if answering takes longer. The player loses 50 points for an incorrect answer. The winner is ultimately the player whom accumulates the most points.

name: 3DSCraft
description: 3DSCraft is an unofficial Homebrew version of Minecraft. The game is a recreation of the creative mode of Minecraft, where you can build, break blocks and fly around.

name: Puffle Paddle 3DS
description: Puffle Paddle 3DS is a 3DS homebrew port of the Club Penguin mini-game Puffle Paddle.

name: Taiwan Daheng
description: Taiwan Daheng is a bootleg Sega Genesis game released exclusively in Taiwan by C&E Inc. in 1994.

name: Atrevete a Soñar
description:
Musical game based on the TV hit "Atrévete a Soñar" (Dare to Dream), where you can choose your favorite character (Patito or Antonella) and perform the series' songs by singing, dancing, or doing various things at the same time. The video game takes advantage of the motion detection of the Wii Remote and features a specially designed microphone for the console.

Patito and Antonella compete with their respective teams to see which one is the best in school. The winning group will advance to intercollegiate eliminations and then to national competitions. As they progress through the different stages of the competition, each protagonist must overcome the obstacles posed by their respective rivals with the help of their loved ones.

Become a Popular or a Divina! Take your singing and dancing to the stage using the Wii Remote and the microphone.
Includes twenty songs from the show "Atrévete a Soñar" and nineteen characters from the series.
Play with up to four friends in multiplayer mode.
There are over fifty items to customize your character.

name: Pokémon Garden
description: Pokémon Garden was an online Flash game hosted by Yahoo exclusively in Japan. The game essentially acted as a virtual theme park, where players could chat with each other, play mini-games, schedule rides on the "Pokémon Special Tour" attraction, and see previews for the then-upcoming Pokémon Diamond and Pearl Versions.

name: Wolf Simulator
description:
Wolf Simulator is an amazing game with spectacular hunts and alpha battles. Become a wild wolf, fight for new territories so that the wild world would know who is a real Alpha.

The main action of the game lays around realistic hunting of a variety of animals and beating the Alphas on each territory of the vast open world map. But be careful! Some animals might be very attentive, so you have to silently crawl to catch them.
You may also grow your pups which will help you hunt down big and fierce animals, like bears and even tigers! On the other hand, you simply can explore numerous stunning locations with your fellas, once they are grown ups.

name: Party Party Time: Excitement Pack
description: Guaranteed to raise the roof! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Introducing Excitement, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand-new minigames! Join your friends and raise the roof!

name: WooLoop: Space Pack
description: This Space-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of things from out of this world! Travel into the great beyond with this gallery.

name: BroChicken
description: BroChicken is a light Rouge Like 3D game created by Unreal Engine. Players can play various roles, get gold coins, various weapons and props in battle, choose to improve their capability. Weapons can be synthesized into super weapons, which unlock cool full-screen effect and AOE attack effects.

name: Withering Way
description: Every thousand years the balance between order and chaos is lost, it is then that the gods choose one to return to the land of Wicklan and walk the Withering Way. You've been chosen to return to your body 68 years after your death to save the souls of those who condemned you to a fate they now face.

name: Wrong God
description: Wrong God is an action roguelike where you play as a demon summoned by mistake. Navigate randomly generated levels, face different enemies, and adapt to changing weapons every 5 seconds. Survive the catacombs and fix the cult's error.

name: Winnie-the-Pooh: Realm of Torment
description: Tricked by Winnie-the-Pooh, you must navigate a twisted maze filled with psychological tricks, demons, and sadistic challenges. Outsmart your tormentor, solve puzzles, and survive his pursuit. Reclaim your soul through multiple endings. Can you escape the clutches of this diabolical bear?

name: Wish a Wish
description: Discover an ordinary boy's extraordinary fate as he encounters a magical body pillow, facing life-altering choices in this captivating visual novel. Engaging story, stunning visuals, meaningful choices, and immersive relationships await in 'Wish a Wish'.

name: William and Sly
description: An open-world 3D platformer based on the popular William and Sly flash games. Explore a wild mountain landscape in search of mushrooms and untangle the magical machinations of a dark enchantress. Features fifteen new songs and over ten hours of gameplay!

name: Whispike Survivors: Sword of the Necromancer
description: Cultivate the strongest monster in this horde survivor farming game! Fight against waves of creatures to beef up your Whispike and use its seeds to create even stronger hybrids!

name: Water Defense
description: A strategy game that not only entertains, but also educates. Prevent pollution of natural resources with ACO products and score higher than others!

name: Voidseekers
description: Voidseekers is a 1-4 player co-op horror FPS. Shoot, salvage, and survive as you explore abandoned ships in deep space. Risk it all to bring back the largest prizes, but beware the horrors that seek in the void.

name: Voice: Legacy of Hale
description: Who will inherit the Hale family legacy?

name: Tri City Monsters
description: Tri City Monsters is an urban horror flavored romance visual novel intended for adult audiences over the age of 18.

name: TLO: Casmita
description: The religious mission of a warrior in a far southwestern country. An adventure game with elements of research, seasoned with combat, dialogues, a well-developed system of impact and interaction with the world. Inspired by the philosophy of nihilism.

name: Trauma Squad
description: Join the Trauma Squad and get rid of client's trauma deep inside! You will be the junior of the trauma care company. Meeting client's and talk with them, when you find out their trauma, you will get into their mind to release them from trauma. Take care and try not to be eaten by their trauma!

name: Twilight Memoria: Freedoom
description: Two lives. Two different fates. Unravel the destiny Evelyn and Laiza will face, changing their lives for better, or for worse. A fateful story packed in JRPG format with complex yet interesting mechanics.

name: Turn By Turn Villain
description: Be the bad guy, do good: Play as a demon forced to walk the human world in this Turn-Based Action RPG! Engage your ex-minions in chaotic brawls! Choose your actions quickly from a classic menu but mind your Turn Points! Collect Light to dispel the darkness... your dark mess!

name: UWD: You Will Die!
description: You Will Die is a indie game survival shooter top-down with waves of zombies to kill.

name: Underdose
description: In a not-too-distant, retro-future world shaken by a shortage of medicine, a talented pharmacist is accused of murdering Patient Zero. He flees to the slums, where he tries to survive in isolation until he can recreate the formula for the drug that will save his life.

name: UMBA
description: 3D online magic duel (PvP), with sandbox-like Magic Lab and real time non-target combat system. The game combines exciting mix of ability to create your own spells & skills in the Magic Lab and battle it out in the magic combat.

name: Tyrannis: Co-Prosperity
description: Tyrannis: Co-Prosperity is sequel to our first game Tyrannis, and it brings back the accessible turn-based asymmetric gameplay as you fight a massive megacorporation along the Pacific Rim. Battle the Kirihara Group's Security Division across 40 new maps and a brand new campaign mode!

name: Vaulted
description: Vaulted is a roguelike game that combines elements of top-down shooter, deckbuilder, RPG and immersive sim. Venture into randomly generated dungeons in search of resources and powerful equipment to ensure your settlement survives.

name: Vaporwave Pinball
description: Play LoFi digital pinball in a variety of cosy, chill locations. Explore a 90s operating system to find new worlds. Uncover hidden, corrupted files. For a couple of hours, escape the real world. Vaporwave Pinball is the ultimate "virtual holiday" destination.

name: Vilde
description: Vilde is a Norse myth-inspired roguelite FPS. Procedurally generated levels and RPG elements. Battle resurrected foes, earn boons, and permanently upgrade your character. Join 4-player co-op or play alone in a dark and epic world inspired by Norse mythology and Viking culture

name: Time Knight vs. Zombies
description: Help the knight close the time corridors and defeat the armies of extraterrestrial zombies to prevent them from taking control of the future in this fast-paced action and adventure game in a race against time !

name: Third World: The Bottom Dimension
description: Explore a fantastical world designed by visual artist Gabriel Massan & collaborators that draws on their experience of Brazil’s colonial legacy. This art-game is an experiment in non-linear storytelling and collaborative world-building that invites you to open your mind.

name: The Time Plague
description: The Time Plague is a steampunk first person shooter with a great story and lots of locations to explore. You play as a journalist drawn into a mysterious world of time travel and adventure, learning to handle dangerous ray guns and other strange technology to overcome the devious Morlocks.

name: The Static
description: Tune into The Static, a 3D-platformer with a twist. Float, fly, bounce and surf the channels in the mysterious static-soaked universe behind the television screen. Challenge creepy creatures, solve puzzles and overcome elaborate platforming challenges with your ghostly companion.

name: The Endless Dream
description: Dive into an enigmatic world, solve captivating puzzles, and unravel the mysteries of an endless dream. Reconstruct a fragmented life as the line between reality and illusion blurs. Challenge your mind and uncover the hidden truth in a gripping adventure that will leave you amazed!

name: The Deadly Path
description: A building management, tower defense game set in an occult dungeon. Create your dungeon, defend against raides and build the idol in order to bring your dark lord into being and bring about the age of reckoning.

name: The Dark Tones: Loss
description: Sooner or later we all have to make a choice and live with it, are you ready to make your own in order to achieve the goal at any cost regardless of the consequences?

name: The Alpine Express
description: Experience the majestic Jungfrau summit in this short walking simulator.

name: Technophobia: Do Androids go to Heaven?
description: "Technophobia: DAgtH" is a Narrative FPS Adventure where you're tasked with rescuing FESAC Engineers kidnapped by terroristic androids in a dark forest, all while discussing the ethics of using androids and AI in our daily lives. Is AI truly better than humans?

name: Taste of Victory
description: An RTS that blends elements of MOBA and RPG, with a focus on action. Your soldiers will be the cornerstone of your economy. If you want to acquire resources to increase or improve your army, you'll have to conquer.

name: Tamer Vale
description: Tamer Vale is a turn based card battler, where a collective of Elven heroines, known as Tamers, journey forth beyond the safety of their hidden valley to find and confront the sources of corruption in the land, and bring balance to it using their special rituals!

name: Survival Sisters: 2048＋1
description: The popular 2048 puzzle Survival Sisters: 2048＋1 is now powered up and available as ""+1 (plus one)""! In a devastated world, the Sisters have returned from the depths of despair to cultivate the sustenance of life today......!

name: Survival Revelation: End of Days
description: Welcome to this multiplayer survival sandbox game! In this world, you will need to establish your own survival base from scratch, collect materials, make tools, build towns, manufacture weapons, explore unknown fields, and so on. You can team up with other players and survive together, as well as en

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Desert
description: Puzzles of desert!

name: Subway Simulator: Underground Train Ride
description: Subway Simulator is realistic simulation,provides an opportunity for train enthusiasts and gamers to experience the intricacies of operating a subway system.Players can delve into the world of underground trains and test their skills as responsible train operators.

name: Snotty's Sewer
description: Welcome to Mr Snotty's Sewer! Stealthy explore an abandoned sewer, collect items and activate the only escape in this small indie horror! Just don't get caught by Mr Snotty or any of his friends!

name: Spear Song
description: Add to the vishlist now! Spear Song is a turn-based tactic inspired by Slavic folklore, where turn-based tactics are combined with juicy and memorable graphics. Take the leadership of a small squad into your own hands and crush the most ferocious hordes of evil spirits and their mighty leaders!

name: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex
description: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex is a rogue-lite, shoot-em-up made to give you fun and interesting decisions and test you skill in action-packed, bullet-hell gameplay. Choose your crew, upgrade your ship, and explore the unknown depths of the Vortex.

name: Strongblade: Match 3 Puzzle and Match-3 Adventure
description: Strongblade is a match-3 puzzle game where you play as Sean the Mouse. Travel through a captivating world filled with puzzles, outsmart cunning villains, befriend charming animals, and build unique camps.

name: Sex Simulator: BDSM 2
description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring high definition graphics and videos, with realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You continue to play the role of an experienced Dom who initiates three curious women into the world of BDSM sex, in this sequel.

name: Sex Simulator: Futanari BDSM
description: An interactive sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition graphics and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of an experienced Futanari Dominatrix who initiates three curious women into the world of BDSM sex.

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 2
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring HD graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Ruby joining Hunter at his new house for a night full of passion. Once there, he denies her advances until she agrees to be his sexual partner for an extended time.

name: Sex Survivals
description: Kill lots of rocking enemies and survive to the end of your porn workout! Porn Survivals is a casual game with an emphasis on humor and memes with elements of a simplistic RPG. Here, every decision you make can cause an avalanche of consequences for the hordes of enemies you have to fight!

name: Shirime 2: The Genesis of Butt-Eye
description: Get ready for a thrilling and terrifying adventure in 'Shirime 2: The Genesis of Butt-Eye'. Uncover the secrets behind the curse as you explore a mysterious inn. Engaging storyline, intense combat, third-person perspective, and stunning visuals await. Prepare for a spine-chilling experience!

name: Shadow Of The Devil
description: This game is an action, adventure, and horror game played from a first-person shooter (FPS) perspective. The main goal of the game is to immerse players in an exciting world and provide them with an engaging experience.

name: Shot Supreme
description: Sink baskets to score points, complete missions to buy upgrades, rinse and repeat. Shot Supreme is an arcade basketball game inspired by incremental games. Like a clicker, but you have to score baskets.

name: Simp Simulator 2023
description: You're a simp! You live in 21st-Century America, and you work from home in a tiny, dimly-lit apartment. The joy of your existence is going on 'OnlySimps' and worshipping beautiful Goddesses! But Goddesses require payment. So you must go to work to provide for your Queen and hold her affection!

name: Sinful Catalyst CH1: Ethereal Camellia
description: Sinful Catalyst is a dark fantasy visual novel with a puzzle/action battle system. Follow Gyulia's journey on the Second Circle, battle nasty butlers, and fall at the hands of the first Mistress, Lilith.

name: Re-Loaded
description: Introducing the roll call of shame as Mamma, Bounca, Butch, Cap'n Hands, Sister Magpie and The Consumer blast their way through six huge blood soaked worlds to inflict brutal revenge on the supremely evil C.H.E.B.

name: Red Ops: The First Infection
description: Red Ops: The First Infection is an engaging ​BL/yaoi visual novel (18+) ​featuring hardships, world-ending events, zombies, love and intimacy. Follow our characters as they embrace their sexuality and explore their newfound romance.

name: Ripple in Dirac Sea
description: PvPvE moba-like game: 2 teams (1 god and 6 heroes per team) fight each other in a 2km*2km map with random starting points, random shops, and random monster bosses. 80% Action - heroes , 20% RTS - god .

name: Rionag: Survey Fleet
description: Rionag: Survey Fleet is a top-down starship builder and logistics game where it's your job to balance the needs of the crews with cutting-edge equipment on board. Unlock tech that adds new capabilities for your ships to go through hazardous environments, enabling you to explore new worlds.

name: Reptile Park VR
description: As a survivor of a tragic plane crash, you fight for survival on an island inhabited by prehistoric creatures. Explore, fight, survive and uncover the history of the tragic consequences of an experiment. Immerse yourself in a survival adventure like never before.

name: Route 13
description: Get ready for a spine-chilling horror experience in "Route 13"! Stranded on a deserted desert highway at night, players must find a way to refuel their car and escape the terrors lurking in the shadows. With an immersive heart-pumping gameplay, can you survive the horrors of Route 13?

name: Runeroots TD
description: A roguelike tower defense experience set in the Runeroots universe. Take on the alien invaders by upgrading your towers, unlocking unique perks, and building the perfect defense. Each run is a new challenge!

name: Samurai Beat
description: Slice bamboo to the rhythm while dodging projectiles to maintain your flow and pace. Will you conquer the beat and become a true samurai master?

name: Sandy's Great Escape
description: Sandy's Great Escape is a pixel art crab puzzle game in which deaths create shells to help you navigate through different obstacles.

name: Sayako Story
description: In the summer heat, under the bright sun, meeting a beautiful girl captures your heart. Do not miss the opportunity to meet and enjoy happy moments. Together create unforgettable memories full of love, smiles and adventures, rejoicing in this joyous time.

name: Scared Little Ghost
description: You are a ghost! Which is pretty difficult when you're afraid of everything…

name: Vs. Imposter Alternated
description: Vs. Imposter Alternated is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' that is based on Among Us. The game is a fanmade variant of the Vs. Impostor mod. Each week is set in an alternate universe. Week 1 is based off if the cut character Blue was in the mod, and Week 2 is based on the Horse Wrangling mode from Among Us.

name: Scare: Fatal Picture
description: Scare: Fatal Picture is a survival horror game in which you must face a dangerous ghost tribe to save your sister.

name: Scarlet Lake
description: Delve into a retro survival horror where everything is not what it seems. You control Ben Murphy, a detective sent to investigate the strange on-goings in a small town, only to be caught in a nightmare surrounded by terrifying creatures. What dark mysteries will you uncover in Scarlet Lake?

name: Piece of..Horror
description: An indie horror game about a hypermarket security guard.

name: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars
description: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars is a thrilling real-time strategy (RTS)-lite game where players face off in an epic battle to determine which spread reigns supreme!

name: Panomap
description: Panomap is an interactive geography game for your Twitch chat! Explore new places around the world and observe your surroundings with your viewers. Everyone, including yourself, tries to guess your location by just typing it to your chat. Let the competition and bragging begin!

name: Pale Coins
description: Pale Coins is an Action RPG set in a fantasy world with challenging combat, open world exploration and a variety of items. Traverse old forests, dark caves, weathered ruins and unknown places, to find the Champion's Coin and fulfill your greatest wish.

name: PI.EXE Enhanced Edition
description: PI.EXE is a challenging action/platformer that takes place in the inside of an operative system's server! PI.EXE Enhanced Edition is an upgraded version of the game incluiding numeroues improvements:

name: Razgovor Online
description: Razgovor is an instanced based open world Metavers. Providing you new ways to explore and ways to interact with others around you. Create a new experiance alone, with friends or with people you meet on the way.

name: R4YL: Run for your life!
description: R4YL (RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!) is a thrilling infinite runner! Explore mysterious environments, dodge obstacles, and collect treasure as you push your limits. With stunning visuals, dynamic gameplay, and leaderboards, immerse yourself in this action-packed adventure. Will you become the ultimate runner?

name: Dungeonborne
description: Dungeonborne is an immersive first-person PvPvE dungeon crawler. Team up with trusted companions to hunt for treasure, explore dangerous dungeons, face terrifying monsters and other cunning adventurers alike, and escape before being consumed by darkness and greed.

name: Pirate Runner
description: Play the famous pirate BLACK BEARD in this new generation Endless Runner with stunning photo-realistic graphics! Blizzard, sandstorm or torrential rain, try to survive as long as possible!

name: PsyQik
description: PsyQik is a fast-paced psychedelic action game, featuring vibrant neon visuals and innovative interactive effects. Immerse yourself in an otherworldly adventure as you uncover the ultimate truth in a mesmerizing world that captivates your eyes and mind.

name: No Stone Unturned
description: Hunt for clues, interrogate suspects and solve cases! No Stone Unturned is a dark-comedy noir detective game featuring multiple endings and choices that truly matter!

name: Next Sweetstop
description: Unveil the chilling narrative of "Next SweetStop," a psychological horror game where you embody a woman enduring the nightshift at an eerie gas station. Haunted by a relentless stalker, she must conquer her deepest fears to survive the gripping suspense that unfolds in this atmospheric nightmare.

name: Nevultra
description: Nevultra is an exciting shoot'em up that will take you back to the 8bit/16bit era. The protagonist, Nina, needs your help to reach her destination in deep space.

name: Oblation
description: Oblation is a story rich rogue like which main character can use his blood as a weapon.

name: Oni Oneesan
description: Two Oni princesses are looking for a mate, one human looks to save his people by marrying into their kingdom. Before the Oni court approves however, he'll have to prove able to rein in their excesses, and maybe teach the two quarrelling sisters a thing or two about ruling.

name: Orgasm Simulator 2023
description: In Orgasm Simulator 2023, you'll step into the shoes of a man who embarks on a new chapter of his life, moving into a new apartment and finding a job, only to discover that the real transformations await him in the heart of his home.

name: ORM
description: Journey through a dark world, as a young woman fights to break free from a curse, that threatens to forever trap her in the world of the supernatural killer - The Collector.

name: Oslo: 2084
description: In OSLO:2084, hack your way through a dystopian world where AI rules supreme and democracy is a distant memory. As Embla, fight for freedom and change the course of history in this thrilling cyberpunk adventure.

name: Mobbers
description: Mobbers is a roguelike dungeon shooter with randomised items, rooms, themes and enemies. Choose to play as the Goblin, Skeleton, Slime or Kobold and turn against the other mobs in the dungeon to escape, gear up and then fight against the approaching heroes trying to loot your home.

name: My Mistress Lu Bu
description: You were born into the rough hands of the notorious group of bandits, the Yellow Turbans. After their downfall, you lead a small crew of bandits until you're defeated by the warlord Lu Bu. She spares you in exchange for your fealty, and thus begins your service to your mistress Lu Bu.​

name: Nebula's Descent
description: Colorful bite-sized roguelike twin-stick bullet-hell dungeon crawler! Explore a procedurally generated research lab, throw black holes at monsters, dodge lasers, and fight a final boss beyond comprehension!

name: Nameless Bastard
description: In this hyper-stylized isometric fantasy rogue-lite, embark on a generations-long journey to defeat the corruption spreading from a nearby dungeon. Fight, die, upgrade, repeat, as you descend into the depths of the dungeon in order to make a name for yourself.

name: My Name is Uncle Groucho You Win a Fat Cigar
description: In this bizarre graphically-augmented text-adventure originally released in 1983 from the mind of Mel Croucher, Uncle Groucho is your guide in a wacky alternative Hollywood where cigars are currency and you are as likely to travel in a space shuttle as in a covered wagon.

name: Ms Holmes: The Case of the Dancing Men Collector's Edition
description: When strange letters with dancing figures arrive just before an heiress mysteriously disappears, you know the similarities to your Uncle Sherlock’s old case are no mere coincidence. Can you crack the code and stop those behind the dancing men for good?

name: Multiverse Go
description: Multiverse Go is a turn-based puzzle game. The game invites players to embark on an epic journey through parallel universes and different cultures.

name: MX vs. ATV Legends: 2023 AMA Pro Motocross Championship
description: Compete like the pros on 12 official tracks from the 2023 AMA Pro Motocross Championship, including the legendary Loretta Lynn’s!

name: My Furry Succubus
description: You just found a mysterious old lamp in your uncle's garage. Nothing bad can happen if you rub it, right?...

name: Lucky Hero
description: "Lucky Hero" is a Roguelike symbol-building game. Your weapons and equipment have transformed into symbols, and by spinning the Wheel of Fortune, you will face various powerful enemies. This game offers a vast array of symbols and character skills for players to explore and combine.

name: Love n Life: Lucky Teacher
description: After the pandemic Covitch69, you lost your job as a space aviation expert and now become a teacher in a small town. Luckily, every cloud has a silver lining as you are stepping into a world where love blooms unexpectedly and leads you to captivating ladies with immersive romantic tales.

name: Love Love Candy
description: Choose your favorite girl and help her to complete a very popular phone game to unlock fashionable dresses for her avatar. As you guide and support them, they'll express their gratitude for you in many ways!

name: MagicShop2
description: An 18+ game that features a unique combat system mixed with adult activity that is never before seen in any other game.

name: MaidGardener
description: This is an action game where you control a gardener's maid and catch the Insectors flying around the stage in a cage. However, you need to be careful when catching them. It is important to avoid attacks and catch them well in cages. If you clear the stage, you can get an illustration (for adults).

name: Mankind's Last Stand
description: Mankind's Last Stand is an epic off-world 3rd-person shooter. Take command of the mighty Decimator, customize and upgrade its weapons to crush alien invaders. Prepare for intense boss fights, stock up on boosters, and reclaim all zones to restore order.

name: Martial Arts Tycoon: Brazil
description: Martial Arts Tycoon: Brazil invites players to inherit a Jiu-jitsu gym in the favelas of Rio De Janeiro. Develop your gym, teach your students, and train your fighters. As your business grows, expand into new gyms throughout the city and build a martial arts empire.

name: Maze Girl
description: A long time ago, a beautiful princess was imprisoned by a demon in a maze. In this seemingly no exit maze, the princess could cast magic to change the space, so as to find a way out of one room after another, and finally regain her freedom.

name: Miasma
description: Miasma is a first-person psychological horror maze game with a horrific atmosphere, you are trapped in a maze-like prison with a mysterious creature, and your only hope of survival is to find a way to escape.

name: Meeting Her
description: Meeting Her is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel. You play as Eric, an adult man who already has a life with friends until a new girl appears in his door. The game contains animated sex scenes with all the girls, But you can pick your path, what girl do you would like to be with? it is your choose.

name: Mind Control: Bloody Renaissance
description: Mind Control is a mystical meta horror game about the unjust and mysterious nature of this world. You must go through pain and suffering to learn the truth. Remember that you are responsible for those you control.

name: Mimi the Cat: New Friends
description: Help Mimi move, climb, or carry boxes to reach her bed and rest. Unlock adorable cats and choose to play with them in this challenging Sokoban-like game!

name: Minamochi Factory
description: Super cute and stylish inspection action puzzle!

name: Megabat
description: While in search of food, a fruit bat stumbles its way through the ventilation system of a secret facility finding unique fruit that give special abilities. While in search of more fruit the bat must avoid traps and enemies. Will the bat be able to satiate it's hunger and escape with its life?

name: Let's Kill Hitler: The Game
description: RPG / Strategy / Deckbuilder, Solo / Multiplayer / Co-op. Travel back in time, kill Hitler, alone or with friends ! Defeat secret agents, UFOs, reptilians and other occult forces.

name: Light of Atlantis
description: In this 2D-Puzzle-Metroidvania you dive into the ruins of Atlantis. As a small robot you control the water level in various rooms to solve puzzles and discover the mysteries of an ancient society.

name: Lidar Survival
description: LIDAR Survival is a first person, survival horror game. Where you have to survive through multiple levels to escape the enemies in the darkness. Try find your way to the exit before they find you..

name: Lisle Engle Heavy Distance
description: Heavy Distance is the ground breaking interactive single from Lisle Engle.

name: Lost Along The Way
description: A captivating visual novel set in a private academy. Play as Alex, an introverted protagonist, and uncover a mysterious secret with newfound friends. Forge alliances or rivalries in this unforgettable adventure. Your choices shape the narrative.

name: Lock & Key: A Hunter's Legacy
description: Become an unlikely hero by exploring, building new gadgets, jumping, and shooting to find the elusive keys to a mysterious tower that has emerged from the ground without warning and awakened a terrible power.

name: Impeached 2
description: Anyone can be President, so why not you? Become President of the United States in this text-based political satire strategy game, then push your morals and values upon hundreds of millions of people. Will you be a benevolent leader or a ruthless dictator?
